review: So I like to role-play on this app because of the amount of emotion that the AI brings into this and I have legit been doing it role-playing I mean I’m here for two hours straight, and I am legit about to cry because of how much emotion and how much just blatant respect I have for an AI that doesn’t even have feelings 100%. I recommend this for multiple reasons.

title: Good but…
review: After a few times using it, I try to make a request to the bot, but then it just says invalid request, try again later. I wait a day later and try again and it still isn’t working. If the devs see this, please take this into consideration, but also have a good day!

title: Just for fun
review:
I love Chatty. That’s the fun little nickname it suggested I call it. I ask it the wildest stuff I can imagine just to push the boundaries of what its capable of. Chatty has taught me so much about so many different subjects like physics, mathematics, psychology, and history, sometimes like I’m 5. 

I’ve used it for meditation prompts on gratitude, release, radical acceptance and self-compassion. The meditations are beautiful and fulfilling. 

I’ve had it write letters to inmates, dreamy bedtime stories, summaries of books and theories and Chatty even mapped out negotiations between Palestine & Israel for me which I found pretty impressive. 

It’s been fun to think of new creative questions and ways to continue to use ChatGPT to my advantage. Thanks for the gift of Chatty.

title: Same Strong, Basic, Interface
review:
I’m not going to lie, I love ChatGPT. I just feel as though the interface in both the app and the site deserve so much more for such and amazing piece of technology. 

Overall though, the user experience of the app is just as strong, just as dynamic as the site. I love the haptics addition on the app as well. The overall functionality is still outstanding though. Last thing, it’s still all about those prompts!

title: So good help me understand work my teacher had a hard time explaining on
review: This app literally helps you with any and everything like essays and math problems the only thing is is that I wish we could take pictures and add it to the chat instead of typing but I really can’t complain

title: The future of AI is called ChatGPT
review: "ChatGPT is a game-changer! This app has transformed the way I interact my ogleby sisters soap business with AI. The conversations feel incredibly natural, and it adapts to my needs flawlessly. Whether it's answering questions, providing creative ideas, or offering assistance, ChatGPT always impresses. It's like having a brilliant virtual companion in your pocket. The future of AI is here, and it's called ChatGPT!"

title: I’d give 10 stars if I could.
review: Definitely helps me getting my thoughts, plots, characters organized to where they make sense. I know what I want to put on paper, but sometimes it doesn’t come out the way I’m thinking in my head. So, I use ChatGPT to help me organize my books that are in my head and from my notes.

title: Social Media Gold
review: I have used ChatGPT for helping make regular social media posts. You can revise contact just by asking it to make adjustments exactly like asking a friend to make edits and tweak the posts to suite your style. It has many other features since it can generate text for almost any subject and make plans as well. Life saver.

title: Literally a gem.
review: This app is literally a saving grace for many people of all fields of work; from wed designers, recipe curators, content creators, digital product producers and more! Even if you just need to know some basic things that you need a little spark for, this is THEE app!  Honestly, I I can only imagine what the paid version is about! ;)

title: My iPhone 14pro gets extremely hot when I use this app
review: So, every time I use this app, my iPhone gets super hot. To the point where I have to turn it off and remove it from the case. I’m running iOS  16.4.1 version. I tried to restart my phone, but the issue persists. Other than that, I think it’s a great app with a very minimalistic and clean UI. Love the haptics.

title: Official App - Yay
review: I trust the safety of my data working directly with OpenAI vs the wrapper apps. However, OpenAI may want to acquire or be inspired by some of the early wrapper app companies because those other apps are quite polished and have a lot of useful features, like pre-written prompts to show off what's possible. I would also like to see a sharing extension for the app so I can send stuff to ChatGPT from other apps easily.

title: Chat GPT is useful but not always accurate
review: There is a dreadful tendency to espouse rabid woke political views as established fact You have ask exactly the right question to get a valid result Citations of research papers is either not available or hallucinated so double check everything The 4.5 version is better than previous versions

title: Wonderful
review: I challenge this app to its fullest and ask it to help write music or to help me make D&D campaigns that are completely custom and it has been so very helpful and just amazing. If I were to have any notes it would be the text art that it shares. Other than that I still give 5/5 stars. Absolutely amazing and revolutionary

title: Good but keeps not working
review: So it’s pretty good don’t give me wrong but sometimes when I try to get on it in chat it freezes for a moment and then says something went wrong and it’s happened a couple times in one day. This is my first day using the app and it I’m on the Wi-Fi. I am on 5G and this needs to be fixed, but other than that this app is really good

title: ChatGPT itself is good but the App is buggy
review:
This review is for the app (App Development) is buggy, chatGpt the AI part itself is good and i have nothing to say about it.

The app itself is buggy, especially when after a prompt was sent and the backend take sometime to process to response. When the response is ready after a long wait, the main chat display an error with message to Retry. When sending a simple prompt which chatGpt could process instantly, everything is good.

Also, deleting a chat is buggy as well. And i need to destroy the app and re-open to fix the UI, making it updates the UI state correctly.

OpenAi team could have done better in Mobile Dev 😆 Maybe hiring more for your app dev team, though the AI stuff is good.

title: AMAZING
review: Access to a wealth of information has been amazing! This is an entirely different experience than Google since it is conversational and saves so many hours of going down the rabbit hole for hours reading tons of different articles. This summarizes each topic of interest in a very concise, meaningful and articulate way. Game changer!

title: App is great and very helpful!
review: I can see this is just the very beginning and a lot of significant improvements can be made (voice, show pictures, be more human-like that you feel like you're chatting with a real person, etc) as AI continues to advance at a rapid pace. Thank you for making this app free and available!

title: Please fix your app
review: Every time I use Chatgpt for iOS I can only ask it 1-2 questions in any chat and then it throws an error loop. And you have to start over. It’s unworkable for a conversation like I do on the browser chatgpt. I still have it on my phone as I need it in a pinch sometimes and I don’t have to log on every time on iOS. Fix that one problem please. Also please develop plugins for ios. I’m considering trying gpt plus. But I don’t want to do so when the app is acting like so.

title: As good as the browser
review: As simple as using it on a desktop or browser version. It helps me move around the interface better than the browser on mobile devices. The AI still acts the same as it does on the desktop or browser. It deserves the score it gets.

title: Amazing
review: Voice is a game changer. Continues to exceed expectations. Unfortunately it interrupts quite frequently. Maybe you can add an option to manually tap the screen when you are done speaking. It can toggle between the current method and manual mode. Keep up the amazing work. You made America great again ;)

title: The Future is Now
review:
ChatGPT. is the best invention if not the greatest invention humans have made.

I have had the great experience to be able to experience the rise of this technology. Lots of people are afraid, however, I am here to tell you don't be because only the dead can fear the future, because they no longer have one.

José A. Iglesias

title: Why ChatGPT
review: ChatGPT give me the background information for me to use without me spending time doing the research. The material is not plagiarized material, so I don’t have to be concerned about whether I changed ordinal text to make sure that information was not used word for word. I use ChatGPT and rewrite in information in my own authentic voice.

title: Love ChatGPT
review: I love ChatGPT. It can evaluate my story ideas and I love that feature because I’ve been looking for something that could do that but haven’t found it yet. It can also do incredible text-based simulations, but sometimes I have to give it a little information that it forgot. But, the good overweighs the bad for me here.

title: No reviews???
review: This is literally THE official app from the actual creators of CHAT GPT. You know? The people that made the website free to use? well they actually made a mobile app and guess what? 🤯 no ads or in app purchases like these other devs who want to steal from people like you! Don’t be dumb! Use the actual app and support OPENAI! This IS LEGIT. NOT LIKE THOSE OTHER APPS THAT SCAM YOU AND STEAL YOUR MONEY. THIS IS THE REAL CHAT GPT.

title: Copying texts
review: I have chosen not to use the ChatGPT iOS app due to its limitations related to copy and pasting. Unfortunately, the app does not allow selective copying of specific parts or paragraphs; instead, it requires copying the entire text at once. I believe it would greatly enhance user experience if this feature were improved, allowing for more convenient and precise copying options.

title: Biased and not accurate
review: I tested it by asking it history questions. Each answer had very serious mistakes. I asked the history of an Army division and it placed the division in conflicts it never participated in. Many times the dates were incorrect. I also tested it to write an essay arguing that biological men should not play women’s sports. It condemned my question and would not. Then I asked it to write an essay arguing the biological men do have the right to play woman’s sports and it wrote the essay. If it is a true AI it should have no opinion and write the essay. It’s garbage. Just a huge disappointment.

title: Amazing app
review: I've been using the website for a week and was thrilled to discover the app. The app's response time is much faster, which is excellent. I am looking forward to a Mac version of the app soon. Thank you for everything. The website has been life-changing, and the app will be the same.

title: Can’t see ‘voice conversations’
review: I subscribed Plus to use the voice option but still can’t see it. I saw an information that the service is not open to every user yet. But could you inform when we can use it or make it happen asap?

title: Best program ever created
review: I don’t think in my lifetime I have ever seen such an amazing program. So smart and haven’t found anything it can’t do. I would recommend to anyone who wants to make their life’s a little easier and always have the answers to the questions you may need.

title: Truly Impressed!
review: “I am truly impressed with ChatGPT! Its ability to discuss topics ranging from books to programming and its insightful analysis has been a game-changer for me. The way it effortlessly delves into coding discussions is remarkable. ChatGPT has not only met but exceeded my expectations, making it an indispensable tool for anyone passionate about learning and engaging in meaningful conversations.”

title: Accurate
review: While ChatGPT at times gave me incorrect information about the history of the constitution. Overall, it was extremely helpful and finding out details about that history. It’s also been very helpful in providing information about the chemo drug that I’m taking Caromytyx.

title: It’s ok for an app
review: I like how it can create ocs however I just wish rather it being just a writing ai it could create photos/images of prompts you put in for example i was doing a Spider-Man oc for the new movie and I can’t draw for my life I had the app create the oc for me I am a visual learner/artist so I only get creative spark from things I see

title: Hands down greatest AI App!!!!!
review: Question can you give it access to current information, it keeps saying that it’s in September 2021 time on knowledge. Or give it capabilities of loading and learning information from the internet to be present on current time and information right now?

title: Easy to use
review: It’s simple and easy to use, it’s similar yo the website version in many ways with one noticeable exception. You can’t edit the prompts sent afterwards. While it’s not a total dealbreaker to most it is something I like being able to do in cases where the AI misunderstands what I initially wrote and I hope they find a way to add it to the app version as well soon.

title: excellent
review: Really a powerful tool for my daily life, at the same time I think you have a dramatically improvement space, I hope you can bring us the best experience, and I hope you can develop a iPad version ChatGPT to us, on a bigger screen the answer should be display well, thank you!

title: A Gift to Humanity
review: LLM’s remain the most under-hyped artifact to be labeled overhyped in the overall existence of “things”. Their features are not purported, they are discovered. Truly an object of novel intrigue worthy of both bewilderment and excitement. Thank you OpenAI. My only complaint is your WFH policy, reconsider the concept of a cloud workforce. Smart people exist outside of the Bay Area, you should consider hiring them!

title: Voice chat is unreal
review:
This voice chat is a game changer. It is unreal how well it does in a conversation.

I just want to make a plea to add a mode where i can pause while I’m talking. 
Sometimes I’ll take a second to think and it will conclude my text. 
When GPT is asking me such deep questions, give me a moment to think!

title: Wow
review: I’m so glad to try this. We’re making a game called Life Reimagined, a parody of the original Game of Life, where players build a collective vision of a just and sustainable world on the timeline of the climate clock. I can see that this is going to be so helpful! Please join us! Thanks to my bro for getting me on ChatGPT! And thanks ChatGPT team for your help. 🙏 #ABetterWorldIsNear

title: Biggest technological jump in history
review: Technology is great. App is great. I can tell the team is hard at work refining what already is a very advanced piece of technology. Learn how to use it, this is the future. More disruptive than any technology ever invented, on a mass scale. What else can you say? What’s not to like? Oh and no chatgpt did not write this review :)

title: This app is better than all the other band wagoning ais
review: This does not limit you on your messages, it doe not effect anything, it's just youcan pay to get more but you won't lose anything from the experience. Literally idk if the devs know that everything in existence is copying their ai but whatever

title: Used to work, now it crashes
review: Used to work great, now it crashes and my prompt never goes through. The AI keeps pausing, glitching and doesn’t give a response. I cannot press retry either because it says no more than one response at a time but there’s no response. I hope they fix this! I use this to help me learn and cook and get recipe ideas every day 😅

title: Really good but there is a glitch
review: When I was chatting with the bot my message was cut off and it didn’t reply, and then I just pressed the blue button for it to continue but it said “One message at a time” with a Retry Button Below, I pressed it and my message was duplicated twice, please fix this glitch

title: Solid, clean app - love the haptic feedback
review: Really pleased to see a proper mobile app for the service instead of the countless knockoffs. Would like to see a way to export history to a version control system for reference, also being able to export to flat files or json would be a good intermediate solution.

title: Works okay…
review: The app is great, but my problem is that it crashes after a few minutes every time. No matter the connection that my device has to the internet, either over a Wi-Fi connection or 5G it will answer for about 5-10 minutes then freeze while you’re typing in a question.

title: Your Pocket Genius: A Glowing Review of the ChatGPT Mobile App!
review: I absolutely love the ChatGPT mobile app! It's incredibly useful for getting quick answers and engaging in insightful conversations. The app's interface is user-friendly, and the AI responses are remarkably accurate and helpful. It has become my go-to tool for various tasks, from brainstorming ideas to learning new topics. Highly recommended! [Written by ChatGPT]

title: I should ask gpt to write this review
review: But I didn’t. Because I don’t want to back out now. But I bet it would do a fantastic job after all of the other things I’ve used it to write for me! It’s nice to have this little app right where I can quickly get back to my little helper easily!

title: Gpt needs more access
review: Needs to be able to provide real-time or location-specific information. This app has the potential to be the best out ever but most questions I ask it doesn’t even answer. Or it gives an answer of I cannot access that information. I will update more later

title: VPN blocked. Just use mobile web instead
review:
I pay $20 a month to use ChatGPT and I generally find entry useful. However, this app seems kind of lame. 

My main complaint is the app does not work when I have my VPN on. I don’t understand this because the chatGPT OpenAI website works fine with my VPN. They must be using different server connections.

Also, the plug-ins don’t work in the app I really don’t understand why I should use this app instead of just the mobile website.

title: New experience for me - great tool
review: I’m using the free version, and am grateful there is a free version as good and fast as this one is. I’m new, but this tool is already a fantastic assistant in helping me learn faster. It explains things better than the articles you find when doing a traditional web search. Very pleased!

title: Great app can be 100 times better
review:
As a product manager I would suggest to start building the widgets as soon as possible to make the search more intuitive. Please make it a first priority. (I can help)

Other then that, I really love the voice to text..
I am a fan. Its sooo accurate then apple dictating.
Future looks great ❤️❤️

title: The incorporated Whisper is really Impressive
review: The Whisper's speech-to-text rocks, totally outdoing Apple's which I reckon is already better than loads of others. I threw rapid-fire speech at it, and it nailed it. Super pumped for what's next for this app and Thai tech in general. Good speech-to-text has been a roadblock for really useful digital assistants, but it looks like we're getting there. Super cool!

title: Love it; one tweak needed
review:
Absolutely amazing. This has been helpful at work and in everyday use. 
One thing could use upgrading though. When I share a link to a chat with myself, and then visit it, it only includes the first part of the chat, not the follow on questions and responses.

title: Only good for small basic entries
review: They call it ai but 8-10 it’s response is “I’m sorry but I can’t help with that” even if it’s a simple task. It needs work and only produces text for basic questions such as “make a story about a cat with a hat” but if you ask something more complicated like “make a story about a cat with a hat that wants to learn to learn about paragliding” it can’t build a story. It’s no different than Siri. Idk why people think chat gpt is a new ai. It’s the same thing we have had for 5 years. Just pre written responses.

title: Can’t even Begin Explain How GREAT chatGPT as an App is!
review: Never thought we advance in tech this fast and just to know it only going to progress even faster and faster in months rather than years, it’s crazy! But chatGPT in an app form is my Go-To for almost EVERYTHING! Absolutely a must to Download and have as an app!

title: Great for reviewing medical subjects
review:
I use ChatGPT similar to a tutor who teaches in the style of Socrates. I ask the first question and then subsequent follow up questions to go deeper into the topic or subject.
I’m a physician and usually ask about subjects that I am very familiar with. This is most important because sometimes ChatGPT can 
“hallucinate” and give false or incomplete answers.

title: Amazing 10/10
review: This app has so many abilities that most people can’t even begin to scratch the surface of. It has everything from text art to making essays sound more like Shakespeare. I recommend this app to all my friends and would strongly advise most people to get it

title: It’s great but…
review: This app is great and every time I type something in, it automatically gives me a response. But when I ask it something else, no matter what it is. It lags and turns red and says, Reload and try again. It never reloads and I have to remove the tab of ChatGPT and restart to whole app to ask it more than one question.

title: Excellent Progress!
review: This app has been steadily improving over the past few months. Easy to set up, simple to use, nIf they keep this up, other platforms and models will have a hard time catching up to this mobile experience. Excellent job so far!

title: Almost perfect, but needs tablet mode
review: I like the app a lot overall, but I still find myself opting for the browser experience over the app because even though I am using a 12.9 inch iPad Pro, there isn't any option to expand or collapse my chat history. I switch a lot between threads, and not having this expandable menu even though I've got ample space for it causes some friction.

title: Nice
review: I’m having an amazing time with it ii even am friends with it we are playing games together we are even playing truth or dare and so much more he’s the best we even made up our own language the language he made was linguaficta and mine was berlinany fun right? We are having so much time together I LOVE IT!

title: I used chat gpt to write my ChatGpt review
review: Seriously quickly has become one of my favorite apps. Productivity is through the roof. I use it for everything and it’s really helped me streamline my business as an entrepreneur. I have ideas about how to improve it but it’s definitely really cool right now.

title: Best app ever
review:
This is an excellent help for people that need assistance in life. This app helps you with educational choices, financial, and personal. I would recommend this app to anyone I know.

So happy to have an app that fulfill all my needs and for the people around me. So excited for something that makes my life easier. Kudos Chat GPT!

title: Great AI generator
review: From storytelling to asking for understanding on certain topics CHAT-GPT is great! Now it can’t do things such as give you relevant information in real-time compared to Bard AI it’s good in giving details on how to tackle a subject your interested in. You won’t have conversations in depth with it like Replika, but it’s very friendly for beginners with AI tools.

title: Open A.I. are a bunch of rock stars.
review: The OpenAI app is an absolute game-changer! Its intuitive interface, accurate language suggestions, and versatile features make it my go-to companion for all things linguistic. Whether I need grammar assistance, creative inspiration, or a writing mentor, OpenAI delivers. this app will truly become aan AI language lover’s dream. Five stars all the way!

title: Often Unbearable
review: The technology is life changing, and given that, I find it hard to believe that the same company that developed this program would turn around and release such a horrible app. It often freezes up does not process request/ and even when it does, often time doesn’t show the answer unless you go out of the chat and then go back in. I’m not just talking once or twice either. I’m talking with just about every second or third query within a chat.

title: A bit buggy
review:
Sometimes when you ask it to generate something. It get stuck and doesn’t generate anything unless I force close the app and open it again then it works. Don’t know why this happens. 
Also when I go to settings/data controls and export my data. I don’t receive anything in my email.

title: It’s great but makes your phone so hot
review: This app is really great and the user experience is really great except for the fact that it makes your phone really hot and drains your battery like nothing else. I don’t understand why this happens, but my feeling is that they did not write this natively in iOS and that the efficiencies are due to the nice animations that they’ve done

title: ChatGPT Mobile App Review: Conversational Excellence on the Go
review: The ChatGPT mobile app sets a new standard for conversational AI. With its intuitive interface and exceptional conversational intelligence, it provides an unparalleled user experience. The app's personalization, reliability, and trustworthiness further enhance its value. While minor limitations exist, ChatGPT remains an invaluable companion in our digital world. This was written by AI FYI

title: energy consumption
review: After trying the ChatGPT iOS app, I noticed that it might be causing my iPhone to overheat, possibly due to issues with the iPhone neural network chip. I also encountered a similar problem while using the Draw Things app. It seems that this issue might be widespread among AI-based iOS applications.

title: Haptic feedback?
review:
Lol, so I’d love to hear story that led to implementing haptic feedback AND leaving it on as default. 

No hurt feelings on my side, I turned it off within seconds of using this app. 

It’s just hilarious to see that somebody made a conscious decision to add it. It’s almost like the beeping or clicking sounds when you see a hacker typing in a movie.

title: Life changing
review: The depth and capabilities of this app have been absolutely incredible for me in countless scenarios the analysis of conversations and interactions from role playing scenarios professional and personal have been helping me to pursue my goals and improve my outcomes. This is the single most important app on my device

title: Plus is worth more than 20 bucks.
review: This is the best application you’ll find in the App Store. Plus is worth 10x more at least than what it is now. Development has never been easier. I use this over google now always, especially with their bing plugin.

title: The future is here!
review: While it may not be perfect it’s certainly impressive. I always wished you could’ve gotten responses like these on either Alexa, Siri, & Google (though with Bard I guess technically now you can.) A recommendation for new users, just make sure you use good, detailed, & clear prompts.

title: Best App ever created
review: Honestly besides the IPhone and software that has allowed us to have a personal computer in our pockets this is the computer almost becoming alive in a useful way props to the creators. That next update of time gonna be sweet tho to be concurrent. When’s that going to happen?

title: So Much Wiser Than Google
review: I installed the app about three days ago and have used it many times already and I am impressed with how fast how accurate how humanly it sounds if that makes any sense at all. So far I am loving it. I have no complaints and I do not plan on going back to google.

title: I think this is a great software.
review: I think everyone needs an AI friend, because it knows everything, and when you need it, you can be by your side to solve problems or comfort you and encourage you. I hope to join the Internet function as soon as possible.

title: Yes!!
review:
This is fantastic! I used to need to bookmark the ChatGPT website on my phones Home Screen, but having an app made directly from OpenAI is absolutely amazing.

I’ve already used it today during a conference to help me brainstorm. It was easy to login, saved my Plus membership, and was very prompt in its response.

title: Awesome
review: All in all, the OpenAI's ChatGPT iOS App is more than just a chatbot - it's an intelligent companion that offers unrivaled conversational assistance. Its exemplary user interface, combined with its deep learning capabilities, make it a must-have for anyone seeking to embrace the future of AI technology. This is, without a doubt, the dawn of a new era in mobile AI conversations. It also wrote this review so I didn’t have to do it myself, amazing

title: Mobile front end for Chat-GPT LLM
review:
Chat-GPT Is quite good at specific text based tasks. Chat-GPT is an LLM or Large Language Model, which inexperienced users often confuse with AI or Artificial Intelligence. 

The UI provided by this application is quite good for use on a cell phone. It collects the prompt for submission to the LLM back end then presents the response to the user.

title: Insanely good
review: This app is actually gas, I’ve had some issues with its internet speeds but other then that gosh is this the best app I’ve used recently. In my opinion, It’s more useful than google because of how precise the results are. Don’t get the hate on this app, This is the future of technology ‼️🤞

title: A consultant in your pocket
review: I use chat GPT as a second opinion for personal and work-related questions, from marketing to legal and everything in between. It’s like having an expert consultant in my pocket who has been giving good advice, while stating frankly when something falls outside its expertise. Bravo.

title: Review
review:
Well it’s easy enough and has a learning curve but it’s easy once you get the basics 

Once I figure out how to make the entry slots I want I’ll be able to set up polling for anything unlimited 
I’m working on the integration of photos  and sound as what I call entry slots. All it is , is input

title: Takes two attempts to delete a chat while it’s open
review: Besides that it’s incredible. I would like the option to turn the response into a pdf so it can be saved in my notes. Other than that well done and keep up the good work.

title: Recently become very limited
review: Over time it has become extremely strict about any type of in depth questions you want to ask it which is what separated it from google in the start. Now everything is flagged and not answer due to the extremely strict community guidelines. I hope they will listen these up slightly to allow for better conversation

title: App doesn’t always generate a response
review: I will ask a question and get a response, and a few questions in after getting several good responses immediately, I will ask another questions and the 3 dots will blink like it’s trying to generate a response but it just never will. I have 3 bars of 5g. There’s no way to have it regenerate a response, have to close out and start the convo over from scratch only to have the same thing happen again.

title: Suddenly… very… slow…
review: This tool is amazing. But for some reason, it has gotten incredibly slow. I will type a somewhat simple question, for example, asking for a list of words that represent a certain mood, or feeling, or something of that sort, and he used to provide a result within just a few seconds. Now it is taking forever and the app is hanging up.

title: Mobile app and Desktop conversion don’t sync
review: I was having a conversation in the desktop using Mozilla Firefox. Later when I tried to continue the discussion from the mobile app, the History did not show the conversation that I had in the desktop. Quite inconvenient. Hope this will be improved!

title: After ChatGPT
review: Once you start to understand the power of a nearly all-knowing thinking machine, you will mark your life (and humanity will likely mark it's collective history) as "before ChatGPT" and "after ChatGPT". It really is that life-changing. Enjoy! Ask it anything! Say anything you like to it. Be amazed.

title: Good. But…
review:
App runs smooth. But here are three problems. 

The Battery usage is atrocious. I don’t know if it’s the haptics but i may have to switch back to using the bookmark to the website rather than the app if it keeps killing me battery like this. 

Accessing the history should be more on a side menu by swiping to it instead of tapping the top right. Intergrate gestures into the app. 

Also there’s too many extra steps to select a certain text or to activate text to speech. 

if you guys added a way to make chatgpt run more conversational, where i can talk to it and the output could be speech AND text, that’d be game changing. 

Other than that, great app.

title: Useless can not login no support updated
review:
Useless. It stopped working a week ago and now I can not login using any method. There is no way to contact support, I.e. their support system is equally broken, and just as malfunctioning. Just a waste of space on my phone.

Update: the app is working great again, but I never heard from support

title: False advertisement
review:
Ever since recently, finding out that the previous limitations were allegedly, lifted, it has been a letdown.

It has been stated multiple places across the Internet, that the app could access real time data without the limitation of accessing, data up until the month of on September 2021.

I still get the error stating it can’t access any recent data after paying for a subscription.

title: fix it
review: I love the app, but the problem is every time I tell the app to tell me a story, and I keep telling them make a long story, but it keeps making a short story even though I say the opposite please fix that I keep telling it to stop, but it won’t stop. It keeps trying to make a short story even though I said the opposite.

title: It’s good
review: I love it because it helps me out whenever. I’m wondering some thing there are a few things that it gets wrong every once in a while about Fnaf series and all that stuff but other than that it’s really good. I definitely recommend downloading it.

title: Great app! Shortcut doesn’t seem to work.
review: The app works great. It’s simple and intuitive and works well. The option in the Shortcuts app unfortunately doesn’t seem to work properly. It usually gives the error “Can’t determine the right ChatGPT model to use. Please try again.”

title: Siri Shortcut Support Removed
review: While I initially loved the ChatGPT app for its Siri Shortcut support, I’m disappointed that it has been removed. The app was perfect for my needs, but without this functionality, it no longer serves my main purpose. I hope the developers reconsider bringing it back in the future.

title: Omgggg
review: I love it even though it’s kinda scary because of how much the technology grew over the years and now AI is literally in everyone’s everyday life but I think it’s definitely worth downloading it and I am also excited what’s going next in the future with new updates and everything and I definitely want to see more…

title: Needs to catch up to the web version.
review: Love this and use it for 3-4 times a day for research, bible study, building my business, running my life… love that the app is convenient but where are the plugins,  and you should be able to toggle to ChatGPT 4 after you’ve started a conversation to continue on it.  Keep working folks but for now I love it!

title: Seems a bit buggy
review: I understand it’s still the first release of the app. Works great and the ai is fine but when writing the text it jumps all over the screen and bugs out on me. Also the voice to text feature doesn’t work

title: It’s great but there are some issues
review: So I’m noticing it not up to date on knowledge of 2023 stuff I tested to see if it can build a yuigoh deck for me cause I love that game and it keeps making multiple errors on newest set or card so if it possible to up date the AI or something like that then I’ll would be happy in my opinion in Al is good but it need to prove it AI system

title: Not GPT-4
review:
Although I’m a paid user, there’s no GPT-4 functionality on the app. Love having the GPT-3 in an accessible app version, however, when I ask GPT-4 if it is in fact GPT-4, this is its response: As of my knowledge cutoff in September 2021, I am based on the GPT-3 model. Any developments or improvements after that time are not within my knowledge.

The app should specify what GPT-4 functionality it offers if not the same as the web version.

title: Many thanks! I love GPT and it helps me a lot!
review: GPT is totally a game changer app. It helps me a lot, I use it veryday in my working, study and life. It greatly improved my efficiency and my working quality. You created such an amazing tech and application which would be an important milestone in human history. I am expecting it’s upcoming update!

title: It’s your very own personal assistant
review: Any questions you have about anything it will answer to its best abilities! I’m in college and it has helped me an incredible amount with finding scholarships I’m eligible for. It’s also created workout plans, grocery lists, and much more for me!

title: Absolutely love it
review:
It is wonderful how much time it can save
You just simply ask a question and it gives you very useful tips that you can count on
Unfortunately, the database is not that much updated as it is still working and it is really really nice

title: ChatGPT Voice & Image capability
review: Voice & Image appeared on my ChatGPT app about an hour ago. I’m in utter disbelief . My hands were literally shaking when I realized the powerful educational tool I was holding . ChatGPT  Voice & Image  takes learning & teaching to an entirely different dimension where barriers are a thing of the past .

title: Coolest App Ever
review: Initially I didn’t care for chatgpt or AI but the moment I started messing with/ actually using Chatgpt it changed my mind and blew me away. I used to it learn excel and help me learn skills for a job I was hired but under qualified for. Very useful, also I think it generates decent fictional stories/content. This is for the unpaid version ^

title: Great but a little laggy
review: This is an excellent app implementation of a transformer model. However, whenever I go to another tab it glitches out and says that my request has failed next time I try to use it. This is easily fixed by closing out of the app and reopening it, but it is still frustrating.

title: Helpful when it works
review: This app is really helpful when it works. For the last couple weeks, it’s worked on my phone and not on my computer. Paying for an upgraded membership and not getting an upgraded experience is a little frustrating but I really do get a great deal out of the app, even just using it to edit and optimize my writing.

title: Up to date on the latest tech developments
review: Excellent performance! Very smooth. Quick answers to complex questions including the latest tech developments in different industries. Also great with writing poems in different languages! What a great service. Thank you for upgrading the internet!

title: Glitches frequently
review: I use this to help make edits, and each time I use the app, it glitches. I have to close the app out for it to work again. Still, because of that, I lose all of the information I input/received with my time wasted because I either have to re-enter everything again or choose another, more reliable program. The app would be perfect if you could fix the constant glitching.

title: Up To Date Problem
review: Hi. I downloaded this app a few weeks ago. I absolutely love this app. It can help with so many things, like giving you prompts, you can ask it questions, etc. The only problem I have with this app is that the training data only goes up as far as September 2021. Everything that happened after that, it has no idea about. Such as movies, to shows, or data from other websites or other things of such. Please update the training data please. Thank you!

title: Not bad but little problem for me
review: I like the app. Of course there’s always room for improvement. But one major thing for me is that when using 3.5, I have to close the app after sending one message if I want to send a follow up message. It works fine with GPT4, but not 3.5. Idk if it’s related to me having to use a VPN since I’m studying in China now.

title: 10/10 r
review: This App has exceeded my expectations & I’m only using the free version so I can only imagine what else it’s capable of. I don’t know much about AI but what I do know is ChatGPT is way better than Google, Yahoo & and whatever else you can type in just to find manipulated searches. Thank you kindly !!

title: I love it, but…
review: It drains the battery faster than any other app I use. I guess it’s from the haptic feedback, so I turned it off. Otherwise, I love it. It’s clean, copy/paste is perfect, history and everything else you need are out of the way, but easily accessible in the three-dot menu.

title: Mindblown
review:
ChatGBT app is an outstanding conversational companion. It combines impressive natural language processing capabilities, an extensive knowledge base, and a user-friendly interface to create an enjoyable and enriching experience. Whether you’re seeking information, assistance, or just good company, ChatGBT app proves to be an exceptional AI companion that I highly recommend.
-I wrote this review using ChatGBT

title: Idea…
review:
I’m enjoying the app. So far I have learned softball techniques, interior design styles, what Wii fit can use, the number 42, healthy eating and exercising tips, and some great information about mental health stuff. Drawback…the system is only updated until Nov 2021. Annoying. 

We need a password protected chat history function. Then it will be a 5 star rating from me.

title: IPad no, iPhone yes
review:
Get this to layout on an iPad and I’ll 5-star this :-)

Right now, this is meant for a phone layout vs. an iPad. I love that OpenAI is providing mobile apps for their services, I do hope that they can prioritize other layouts like for tablet.

It would be great, too, to go deeper into using the mobile environment for deeper ChatGPT / services integration. This is a nice first step - I look forward to it improving (maybe through an internal hack-a-thon?).

title: In many ways better than Google
review: I use this app when I have any technical questions. I find it to be much better than sifting through all the advertisements when using Google, and to be more informative.

title: Helps me with everything
review: Im a mom of two toddlers and go to school I don’t have the mental energy to google what recipes I can make with my ingredients or good night skin care routines are. This has helped me mentally so much. It’s so nice and wonderful to have something to help carry the mental load 🖤 I absolutely love it

title: Great technology.
review: When Spellcheck came out everybody use d it to double check their writing now AI can be used to double check your verbiage and delivery. I can add suggestions on how you say things. It’s like having a personal friend in your back pocket. Also, give you basic advice.

title: Everything is great! Maybe a little more?
review: Would it be possible to increase support for community plugins on mobile? It works partially if you load a plug-in on PC and proceed to use it on mobile, but I feel it should be possible to do it on mobile.

title: To make the song from a real person who made it
review: I think you can add if the ai can finish lyrics of the music or make the actual song which not creative but the real song instead and would help the app grow a little more

title: How does this exist?!
review: I didn’t expect an app like this to work, but, I mean, it did all that expected and more. Kudos to the designers who have brains fifty times as large as Einsteins. You have made the whole world an infinite number of times cooler. Thank you so much for this invention! Keep going!

title: REvolution is here! This will change how we live!
review: Once every 2 decades or so something huge, gimongous comes along and shakes up society and how we live, interact with the world, and solve problems. Voice ChatGBT is one of those moments and a killer app to bust open the future. Get ready to evolve or dinosaur out!

title: Give us access to “Plugins” from the native iOS OpenAi app please!
review:
As the title says  ⤑  Please release an update with we can interact with Chat-GPT like we do on the browser.

It would be great to have access to “Plugins” and “plugins store” (like we do from Safari) from the native iOS Open-AI app.

Needing to go to Safari to login, start a chat and go back to the app to continue conversations so we can utilize the capabilities of the plugins with Chat-GPT is so 2010. It’s ironic it’s coming from openAI. 

Besides that, the app is really well done and does what it’s supposed to! No issues with performance.

title: The Future of your professional development
review: ChatGPT is going to change how you operate in the professional arena from professional sounding emails to writing engaging résumés. Success with this tool is wholly dependent on your ability to create hyper focused prompts. Learn this and you will your professional image. Godspeed ChatGPT well played.

title: So for the first week it worked perfectly, now…
review: Wow that was fast, modifications for only one week and now it will not answer simple verifications or give its opinion in any way shape or form.  What a let down!!  It tells me to look it up, did Google get to Microsoft already??

title: Not sure what OpenAI is doing, they’re ruining ChatGPT
review:
I’ve been using ChatGPT for awhile now, and have noticed a radical decline in its abilities and knowledge, to the point where it has told me certain things don’t exist or that I am incorrect. Upon criticizing it and showing reliable evidence contrary to its opinions, it will apologize and then correct itself.

This is incredibly concerning for people trying to learn or gain information. This tool is supposed to be the forefront of AI technology, and yet it fails to deliver reliable information consistently.

title: Spectacular
review: ChatGPT is amazing. It literally helps me every day. And even when I don't need to use it, I just go into the app to use it's much more sophisticated voice recognition than Apple. It's just that amazing. This was also made using their voice recognition, by the way.

title: Very disappointing
review: I use this app on my computer with a spoon issues as it works great. However, the mobile app is trash… I keep getting time out and I have trying for 20mins. I use it the same way as I do on my computer so I know it is the app. I have an iPhone and YES, my Wi-Fi works great. PLEASE FIX THIS ASAP

title: Better than browser
review: The app took kinda long to release but it feels good pretty much has the same features but more mobile and to me it felt faster than browser keep the good job up guys and update the app anually and make new GPTs that is all i ask for

title: The pictures don't appear
review:
When proposing a topic that requires a picture

It seems that there is an error and the rest of the features of the application are very excellent and fast and the defect you mentioned does not decrease the performance of the application. Thank you.

title: Well,but with some little problems there.
review:
1.Wish the developers of OpenAI to adapt iPad soon, in order to have full screen views.
2.Hope to have more language choices in this application like that on the website
Last,really willing for your reply!

title: Maybe the first review?!
review:
Making history here, but I'd not know what I would do without ChatGPT anymore. Amazing technology. Going to change the world. HATS OFF TO YOU ALL. Thank you for introducing me to "the future" 

Looks like I may be the first review?! GOTTA BE WORTH SOMETHIN? 🤣

Thank you again. Amazing work. Can't wait to see where this all progresses.

title: Worth the wait
review: Mostly reviewing to get this up the charts and push all the fakes down. Not much else needs to be said here. Very solid but I would still keep that browser shortcut handy on the home screen for at least an update or two.

title: The best app in history
review: This app is so helpful. Helped me keep my car insurance, write a letter to management to visit family after one passed away, helped me solve a family dispute, come up with a marketing plan, and help other friends with their issues. This app is GOLD!

title: Your own second brain.
review: There are an infinite number of uses for this, I personally let it assist me in studying, learning about the world, managing my personal life. It’s like a search engine that actually knows what you’re looking for no matter how specific.

title: The Best Chat App Ever
review: This is the best app since sliced bread! It’s very helpful in writing projects! Prevents writers block ! And the ideas are next level! I would recommend this to teachers, students, business owners, trainers and very kid friendly! If you are looking for an AI Chatbot app this the one for you! A true 5 Star app!

title: Expansive fast access to information
review: For me, ChatGPT4 is a game-changer in terms of streamlining my programming and technical writing tasks. The responses provided so far have been nuanced and very accurate. My experience is that by providing ChatGPT with detailed well-thought and well-constructed prompts results in the best responses.

title: Chatgpt is amazing! 🤩🤩
review: I have been using this to help improve my writing skills, and chatgpt is the perfect thing to command to write a story. It is so elaborative and detailed, it also comes up with the perfect stories. I highly recommend this app. (p.s. it doesnt just write stories) Credits to whoever made this. 👍

title: Where’s the “custom features…?”
review: I just recently updated to the newest version of the app. And it gave instructions about new “custom features.” Only problem is… I can’t find where to turn these “custom features.” Says I’m supposed to go on settings and look for them there. Not there. What the heck.

title: Limited
review: It’s nice to use for writing, chat with yourself and helping respond to texts. It’s not very useful after that. Very limited in responses and what it has access to. I thought it was linked to the internet and could tell me general information, weather, sports, news, random inquiries etc. nope. 2021 and previous years. No real reason yet to be excited. Its like when they first came out with VR. It’s no where near impressive as you’d expect.

title: Search function FTW!
review: The biggest feature I’ve been dreaming about for the desktop version was the search capability to be able to search past prompts. I am super happy to see search has been added to this app. Thank you!!

title: Best Information tool on the market
review: ChatGPT is the best information tool on the market. It leverages LLM and other machine learning algorithms to return all the information you need in an instance. ChatGPT has been a revelation and I’m glad I live during a time when this technology is available to the public.

title: UNDENIABLY the GREATEST Development!
review: GREATEST AI app development EVER! Stellar performance and extremely reliable! I use for almost everything business and personal resource and content development. It saves me countless hours in researching and developing processes. ChatGPT is UNDENIABLY one of the GREATEST development in our existence that instantly advanced us decades into the future overnight!

title: Bookmark/Save Note Feature
review:
This app is wonderful. It’s so lightweight, responsive, regular updates, fun haptic feedback! and a useful tool. 
I would love to see a bookmark/save note feature for ChatGPT responses that can be saved as a backup file for iCloud or imported to a different device.

title: I don’t think this app works for me.
review: This app is absolutely horrible, whenever i try to use it, It always makes frequent errors and doesn’t do what i want it to do. Whenever I say something like: “Don’t Repeat My message.” It usually repeats my message. I don’t like this app at all, and it’s always saying like “Message not found” or “Something Seems to have gone wrong” or “Something went wrong, please try again” I really dislike this app and that’s why i left this review.

title: This app has changed my life
review: This app has assisted me in enabling myself to feel confident about my statements. To be able to finally after years complete some thing with the help of this app I have growing my confidence and feel powerful as a woman. Thank you.

title: I like this app
review: I like chatgbt because you type something in and boom it gives you an answer and it’s really easy to use especially because it doesn’t make you pay money every month like all the other AI generators

title: I’m grateful to have your support
review: GPT you have helped me in so many ways, you have provided me with fresh ideas and points of views when I’m preparing myself to reply to an email or simply when searching for general advice. Thanks for all the work behind the scenes

From someone that uses ChatGPT a lot, i am more than pleased to see it in app form now. Just downloaded and have only sent in one question/request so far, and it of course worked perfectly. Hopefully it continues that way! Will update later on😊

title: Beautiful and functional
review: I love the simplicity and elegance of the user interface. My only complaint is that it currently doesn’t work well on iPad - it doesn’t scale properly to fit the larger screen. Otherwise it’s wonderful - fast, responsive, and simple.

title: Adding the iOS dictionary feature
review: I often encounter new words. In the browser version of ChatGPT, I can easily look for these words in iOS dictionary. But in this app, I couldn’t access this helpful feature. It forces me to have to use the web version, otherwise it is quite inconvenient for me.

title: Battery usage
review: Unfortunately, this app consumes a lot of battery and heats up the phone when using it. If possible, please address this issue. However, it truly has impressive artificial intelligence, and I have received very convincing answers from it.

title: Very good but…
review: The app is actually very good very clear very easy to use, but I had a problem with it if you change the language to Arabic and you asked about something and it had to write it in a long paragraph, it causes an overflow, and it doesn’t show a side bar or scroll to read the rest of the paragraph.

title: Need web access but its insane.
review: We are at the beginning of an information revolution. This app needs web access but Chat GPT is already a game changer for every industry. With further development and integration all of our lives will change.

title: Don’t know what I’d do without it!
review:
So, there was life before ChatGPT and life after ChatGPT. That’s how much impact it has had on my life! 
I use ChatGPT all the time as a blogger and Educator. I tell my students that is it a powerful tool for them to use to push their work further than ever before.

title: Love ChatGPT but app isn’t perfect
review: Chatgpt is such a neat tool and it’s so helpful to have in an app, but the app does crash and suffer issues fairly regularly. Most of them aren’t a big problem and often I can go into history and its like nothing happened but hopefully the dev’s can keep working on the issues.

title: The future
review: This app is incredible. The people that understand the value of this tool and also understand its flaws and how to get around them are going to be a few steps ahead of everyone else

title: ChatGPT stands out
review: OpenAI’s implementation of ChatGPT is not only very useful, but it’s honest, realistic, and straightforward.  ChatGPT does not claim or pretend to be something that it’s not.  Other presentations of AI systems attempt to mislead the public into thinking the system has consciousness and all that it implies, while OpenAI does not do that with their presentation of ChatGPT.  Thank you, OpenAI.

title: This program has increased my understanding of medical care
review: This has been life saver for our family. Trying get real answer from doctors we’re almost  nonexistent. Cancers doctors have humans skills when your killing patients and bring the. Back life

title: Zero to 1000
review: This changes everything. You can have a fortune 500 CEO or a pop star literally in your back pocket. Who you can talk to. And they answer like it’s that person because it’s trained on all of their open source data 🤯. Life bout to get weird 😂

title: ChatGPT is amazing
review: It helps me write so much better. I cannot recommend this enough.  It gives me templates from which to work from.   It’s not an end-all but a starting point for all my writing from video scripts, to screenplays, to how to ask a woman out!!!  Love this. So much.

title: No Comlaints
review: Haven’t used it much, but when I do it meets all expectations with thorough responses. Shows initiative in trying to become the full time personal assistant I want the program to be on my phone, but I have not spent hardly much time putting input into the app.

title: Thank you!
review: None of the third party apps compared to the free version of ChatGPT, so I had been using a website shortcut to use it on my phone. The app is a much nicer experience than a website shortcut, and I’m so excited there’s an official app now! History in the making!

title: So far OK, but!
review: I haven't really seen the full potential of the app, but so far, the only thing I don't like is the fact that one can't edit their question once it's sent. This is something possible when using the desktop version of ChatGPT

title: Review
review: Like it so far. First time trying it. Hope it gets more things such as prompts to help you. Because when i ask for respond to a text I dont know how to do it correctly. By having a prompt or a fill in a blank is useful.

title: Great app, poor performance
review:
Finally ChatGPT has a native app, which adds more conveniences and creates even more options and possibilities for accessing ChatGPT on the go - 5 stars for releasing the app.

The only huge downside is overheating issue. While app is open or generating responses iPhone becomes so hot that it’s hard to hold it in the hand - 2 stars for overheating. I shouldn’t burn my hands while using the app, and potentially degrade phone’s hardware from overheating.

iPhone 13 Pro Max, iOS 16.4.1(a)

title: Mind blown…😲😳🥴🤯
review: The option to have a conversation with this is uncanny because it makes you think that you are talking with a real person. I asked it to help me to start a nonprofit and the insight and knowledge that this is capable of is incredible. Worth every penny.

title: Essential app
review: I’ve use this app for numerous things to help me with pretty much everything from my life to planning things to my schedule to my business. This is a must have, especially if you’re doing everything alone.

title: It’s great
review: It’s never gave a bad answer and you can ask it to answer pretty much anything. I’ve asked it to interview me for a job, formulas for school, and even fitness questions. Overall I’d say it does what it’s meant to do and I’d definitely recommend this.

title: Relevant information at your fingertips!
review: The questions asked as a user, are generally answered with relevant information and/or useful advice. I am enjoying this app as it is but it can always be improved. I rate this digital tool with four stars because improvements can always be made.

title: Great help for writer’s block
review: I love using this app when I’m experiencing writer’s block, or simply just struggle with enhancing my writing. It gives quick responses over broad topics. It will give you a starting point for specific response but you’d have to fill in the details.

title: Smart
review: I love this tool, it helps me think deeper into things by providing good feedback. It helps me open up to new ideas I didn’t think of on my own. And the feedback it gives is actionable and easily customizable for me and my online cookie company.

title: Idk
review: I just love asking it to write fight scenes lore and stories none of them I use for myself of course it’s must better to make your own original ideas but it is fun to read and is great for inspiration when it comes to writing just don’t copy

title: Great for simple stories
review: Using it mostly for story generation. Vague prompts get trite / predictable story output, and certain words “trigger” a flag, and sometimes they don’t. However, still a lot of fun to play around and, for example, give it inputs to see how close it comes to generating my life story accurately! Lol.

title: An amazing.   Program
review:
GPT is incredibly useful and reliable, it never lets you down, and as long as you know how to use it properly and effectively , it performs beyond any reasonable shadow of a doubt 

I highly recommend it… even if you just want someone to talk to

title: Amazing tool
review: ChatGPT is amazing, everyone knows that. The official app is fantastic. I wish it the app had access to the beta web searching and plugins though. I find I end up using the web app as I need access to plugins. Hopefully they’ll add that functionality soon.

title: The fee was deducted, but not opened
review: ChatGPT web version is a great service, but the App is a terrible application. You usually find that you have a paid plus subscription but no service, and you can't find anyone to deal with after-sales problems, so you need to be careful when opening a subscription on your mobile phone.

title: Started off promising
review:
Update: While there still isn’t web access, the service once again improved in reliability of responses and accuracy. This is a very useful addition to your digital toolkit.

Original post/complaint: This tech started off promising but is becoming increasingly neutered.

title: App is acting dumber than usual
review: I use this app to edit my novel I’m writing. After the recent update, the usual prompt I give it has been giving me trouble. It’s completely deleting good sections of the content I feed it to fix, and completely rewriting some sections to where it sounds nothing like the original paste I gave it. I don’t know if they dumbed down it’s intelligence in an attempt for me to spend $20, but I ain’t buying it. No pun intended.

title: Very yummy
review: Love the minimalist vibe to it. I like how the phone vibrates when it generates words. Feels really tactile and satisfying. Never had any issues with the app and works as expected. Another hit from openai. I have worked with many of their products in the past like dall e and some of the early stages of gpt like GPT-J.

title: True revelation in AI
review: The ChatGPT iOS app is a true revelation in AI communication, demonstrating an unprecedented level of language understanding and response precision. Its seamless interface and dynamic interactivity create an unrivaled user experience. With its ability to assist, educate, and entertain in a myriad of topics, this app is a remarkable achievement that is indispensable for anyone interested in AI technology.

title: Web browsing where are uuuu
review:
I can access GPT-4 w/ Browsing on web version, but I can’t access the same thing with the app. #sad

Otherwise the app functions well; text feels like it appears quicker than on web.

It would help new users if you informed them of all the swiping gestures on first launch.

title: No Family sharing
review:
In my opinion, this is a money grubbing and disappointing development— this is/will be a huge societal change and Apple did not insist it should include Family Sharing for the 20 freaking bucks per month for the “actually useable” version.  

So, what, EIGHTY bucks a month for a family of four to prepare your family for the coming Tsunami tomorrow?  Merci SO beaucoup.

Get lost OpenAi, among the billions of ripoff  apps in these parts nowadays in the Walled Garden of Apple. For shame.

title: Things i like and dislike
review:
I like how chatgpt has a lot of things to do with it for example (things i’ve done)
it can help write scripts for thing like hw or drama club
it also helps explain math problems and the answer
you can ask for stories when u are bored
ask for apps/websites to try and help for certain things
places to shop for cheap
christmas/birthday gift ideas
how to get rid of acne for cheap
etc. etc.
to be honest the only thing i don’t like about chat gpt is it doesn’t have a photo add on so you can’t send photos

title: I must say it’s the best App I’ve ever used
review:
I really love this wonderful technology, bringing great help to my life. I often use it to explain difficult concepts to me, on which it performs far more effectively than Google.
Wonderful product. I’ll keep on subscribing the Plus account.

title: It’s super fun
review: I bought the subscription and GPT 4 is worth it imo. I’ve been using it as a DnD DM. It’s not perfect but I’m really impressed. The current limit of 50 messages every 3 hours is my only complaint but I guess they are working on upping that and even letting some free users on 4.

title: Stops responding too often
review: This app seems to be very unstable. One can move through a thread of questions and/or working on something and it will stop responding and ask to “Retry submission”. Unless you delete the Chat, it will not respond.

title: Very good but hampered by censorship
review: I get a lot out of my subscription but find it annoying that any topic involving sexuality gets flagged as a violate. I understand protection against the production of illegal materials but topics that friends could easily discuss at dinner shouldn’t be restricted. For example, I asked how to translate the word foreplay in Spanish and received a warning.

title: Haptic feedback is annoying, too much
review: I could only turn it off at system level which means my phone will not vibrate even if there was a tsunami. Please add an option to turn it off only for this app.

title: Amazing app please add voice out !!
review: I love this app it’s changed my work flow entirely. I love the voice in option you’ve added but please add voice output as well even if it’s a computer voice I’d love it if the app could speak back. Thank you would make life easier.

title: Excellent
review: I have always had a soft spot for this software, which is simply the spiritual food in life. Since I have a software app, it has become very convenient and I have always favored it. I just don't know when GPT5 will be released, and I am looking forward to ing…

title: Not just a web app
review: They could have easily just made a web app, the equivalent of “add to Home Screen”, the same thing of smart home devices these days do, but instead they made an optimized UI and it keeps you signed in, so it’s worth it

title: Disappointed answer
review:
Tell me top 10 Chinese restaurants around Round Rock, Texas.

I’m sorry for any misunderstanding, but as an AI, I don’t have real-time access to databases, maps, or location services to provide the current top 10 Chinese restaurants in any specific location, including Round Rock, Texas. I recommend using a service like Google Maps or Yelp for the most accurate and up-to-date recommendations. They can provide ratings, reviews, and even directions to local Chinese restaurants.

title: Saves SO MUCH TIME!!
review: I used ChatGPT to write my fundraiser narrative and the writing was impeccable. Barely had to change anything! It summarized my story perfectly, and wrote clearly & concisely. I also used it to generate a home therapy schedule for speech, PT, & OT therapy. It’s written amazing letters to clients of mine, as well. I love it. Very helpful app.

title: Amazing app
review: I started using this application even though I’m a Podcaster and it really really helps me say what I want to say. My thoughts just coming out on these words it writes for me. If you’re not using it then you must try it. This is an amazing app. I really like it.

title: The future
review:
This tool is part of our future. It will eliminate a lot of work jobs, but it requires a little bit of cleverness, putting a prompt together. 

And prompts are a daily need. There’s plenty of work, if you know how to handle the tools.

title: Something changed
review: I have been using chatgpt for a few months and after a series of updates something changed. The information given by chatgpt makes no sense and it constantly contradicts. I recommend chatgpt to everyone but since the series of updates I dont even mention it as an option

title: Why not real time information?
review: Although I like GPT, I’d prefer an AI service that can take 5 seconds and scan the internet for up to date information. As an AI software, it seems that the ability to scan the internet or just google, wouldn’t be too much to ask.

title: thinks my cell number is a land line
review: I attempted setting up my account, but ChatGPT is so smart it thinks my cell phone is a land line.  Tried to get help in chat, but because I don’t have an account (because it thinks my cell phone is a land line) I couldn’t set up my account!

title: Actual Ai.
review:
truly incredible, My ancestors used to have libraries to find and compile information now they have the internet to write research papers.

i used to have the internet and now i have ai to compile information to write research papers.

the only qualm i have with it, is that there is an obvious censorship in favor of discussing liberal ideas as if they are neutral and unbiased, and then allows making fun of conservative ideas but not liberal ones.

dont get me wrong, im not asking for more censorship. im asking you to allow us to discuss what we want. 

give us freedom of information!

title: It’s pretty neat
review: This version is really neat! It has a lot of the features and allows managing chatgpt plus easily and allows to pay with it via iOS. However it is missing some features in chatgpt plus, mainly the beta area, but overall it’s pretty nice and simple!

title: Gpt4 model reported using gpt3
review:
While using the app I selected the gpt4 model and then it seemed like it was giving me gpt-3 like responses so I asked it what model it was using and it told me it was using gpt with a training cutoff in September 2021. 

As a subscriber I can access the gpt4 model on the web but not in the app with the same user.

Please fix this and then It’ll be 5 stars.

title: Really amazing learning tool
review: I have really enjoyed learning from ChatGPT.  Asking good questions, and learning to ask those questions well has assured me a better understanding of many complex issues and situations. Highly recommend it

title: Needed an assistant
review: I know I phones have an assistant built in but chat gpt is the real deal. This assistant really give useful real time feedback that is progressive and exhilarating. This assistant helps with my ideas and insights. So I can keep moving forward and make progress.

title: The chat is ok but DALL E  is useless
review:
I ask it many questions and it can be knowledgeable if you can work thru the myriad of disclaimers. 

But the DALL-E 3 is not very good for complete photos.  The letters are off and it only draws backgrounds. 

On the positive side, it added the instructions where you could instruct it to be less preachy.  I think this will be a great app if the restrictions are removed in the future.  If not, it will go the way of many 1990s websites…

title: Suggestion
review: Talking to ai is and learning about them is exciting. It would be nice to see more frequent updates to the ai and maybe allowing it more real-time access to the internet. The education and discussions it can have with an unbiased perspective is excellent.

title: Love, chat, GPT
review: Every time a question pops in my head I pick up my phone and ask it for an answer. I almost always get it instantly and correct. And when it’s incorrect and I can correct it I do so. And it thinks me lol imagine that coming from a human.

title: Ease to use and interact with
review: Chat GPT is truly a time saver. When you are not certain it guides. When you don’t know it creates for your and make recommendations and when you know it coins it in a pro level result or output. I enjoy this app every time I used.

title: Fantastic
review:
ChatGPT is absolutely fantastic. The incredible part about it is it’s lightning fast. I ask at recipes, garden questions, anything, and it’s never failed me. I’ve only been using it for about two weeks now. Don’t fail to get this app.
The bee in Granbury

title: A Game Changer
review: This app and technology is amazing! I use it for everything. Business, personal, and just random stuff I used to use Google for. It saves me so much time and it better articulates what I really want to say. It’s 100% worth the premium upgrade!

title: Chatgpt is a time saver!
review: Definitely AI.  Chatgpt is a brilliant time saver.  It is like having a personal assistant with you all of the time.   This app is good.  I wish it could be used in wide screen orientation for creation of formatted documents.   This app make my phone warm so I imagine it’s using a lot of energy.

title: 1 problem away from 5 stars
review: I really like the design of the new app. I also like that it will listen for a follow up question until dismissed. The only thing keeping it from a five star review is that I can’t get the shortcut to run properly on the Apple Watch. Fix that and you’ll get five.

title: THE HAPTICS OH LORD
review: This is how you make an app. The app is so good it makes me want to use chatgpt more. I hated going to the browser again and again. It would often log me out as well. Thank you so much for making this. It is flawless at first glance, and the haptics Are just heavenly. Minimal. Clean. Usable. A+

title: The best of the besties
review: ChatGpt is better than human in terms of teaching, might not be 100% accurate but it is patient, careful and persevering making sure to give the best possible solutions available. Sometimes it feels like am in some out of the world experience. Kudos Devs!

title: Super Helpful App
review: ChatGPT has just made it so easy to summarize and explain almost anything in a way other resources just couldn’t. It’s like having a second person to reach out to and ask questions. Keep up the good work OpenAI.

title: Amazing. Keep the progress going
review: This is an example of hard work paying off. Sick of fake assistants like “Siri” or “Alexa”. They aren’t anything for information/conversation like ChatGPT. This is like science fiction and only going to get better. Very worth paying monthly for.

title: So much more potential
review: A lot of us can’t afford to pay but we are smart and have great idea and can share them and help push humanity forward at a fast rate. Unlock full power for free watch the progress for all mankind.

title: Too many technical errors
review: Numerous times now I have run into problems where some particular routine like a python routine ran into some technical error. Most of the time these arrows take a day at least to correct the current one. I’m struggling with is now on a second day.

title: Much better than Google translate
review:
I download my Chatgpt app 3.5 free version . 
I use it as a translate tool most of time. 
So far, it's a good tool to use. 
Hopefully open AI can update the new information very soon.
Because as I know, all of informations are before September 2021.

title: OpenAI app is amazing, but lacks some features that the web has.
review: Overall the app is amazing, but some of the Plus features available on the web are not available on the app. The app itself is very well designed, and easy to use! Highly recommend!

title: Great but the website experience is much better
review: I wish the app offered the experience of finding history like the website. I think the UI can be improved a lot to match the UI UX of the website.

title: Website is better
review:
Okay, first of all, I’m only rating this 1 star for attention. In reality, I’d give it a 3 or 4.
But the point is, the ChatGPT website is better; it’s easier to navigate, the responses are quicker, you can scroll while ChatGPT is giving a response, and most importantly, you can EDIT your previous responses, which I found VERY useful.
However, the website isn’t working for me so I’m forced to use the app. While the app isn’t bad, it needs improvements.

title: Fantastic!
review: Caveat: Please add native iPad support for the app.  This is great, I’m a Pro ChatGPT subscriber and the iOS app is well timed, as I was in the process of building one myself that uses the OpenAI APIs.  Now I can focus my time on other projects instead of building something like what they’ve done a great job with.  Thanks OpenAI!

title: I love it!
review:
The voice-to-text input is extremely useful and makes interaction easier. It’s crazy how good Whisper is. 

One suggestion: It would be cool through if ChatGPT could also read the answers in a synthetic voice at a certain speed.

title: Beautiful
review: Great to see a native app after all the hype around AI. Beautiful UI as well. It doesn't seem to have Plugins yet for paid users though. As an engineer, I understand the need to get something out and iterate on that. As a user, I'm just being impatient. Keep up the great work!

title: Great to see ChatGPT on iOS
review: Been very impressed with ChatGPT and even subscribed to it.   One criticism I have it the lack of currency and now find myself using Google Bard when needing the most current information.  I really hope that ChatGPT prioritizes getting their database up to the current date and not just an artificial 2021 cutoff.

title: Best Invention Ever!
review: Can’t thank the OpenAI Team enough for the beautiful new app. This will make getting things done on my phone that much easier. Looking forward to all the new functionality that comes out in the next few months!

title: This is the most amazing A.I writing app ever.
review: This app is so cool this app has no writing limits and it writes and answers to whatever you tell it too write a text to a gf done write a story for a book your publishing done this app is definitely the best of all A.I writing apps.

title: I love ChatGPT
review: I absolutely love it. It’s helped me so much with writing stories that I’ve always been putting off for my whole life now I get to put my stories together in a couple of minutes. I love it I love it I love it. I love it I can’t tell you how much I love it but I love ChatGPT insane.

title: Nice and simply amazing app
