review: I found out that with this app you can get information faster than a Google search, it has help me in many different topics and data information. It’s just the right tool ever.

title: My Proof Reader
review: I use it for so many tasks in life. It’s almost like another part of me but a part which is more practical and doesn’t have ADHD. Whatever issue you’re having try asking it or telling and see GPT go his thing.

title: Don’t know how I lived without this
review: This is by far my most used app over the course of this year. I reference it all the time. Google is so far down my list of cached websites that ChatGPT doesn’t have enough token memory to find it.

title: Soon to be the only app you need
review: Chat GPT and Open AI are changing the nature of technology. Using these new powerful tools has never been easier with the user-friendly IOS app they’ve created. Highly recommend to anyone!

title: Incredibly Helpful AI Assistant
review:
ChatGPT is a game-changer. As a software engineer manager, I appreciate its ability to provide technical answers swiftly and accurately. Its clean and concise responses make it a valuable tool for solving coding and engineering challenges. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for an intelligent digital assistant.

Rating: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Helpful
review: Very helpful when you have a question about almost anything. Also a great way cure boredom. The only downfall is that it’s not up to date with current events. ChatGPT only knows things from 2021 and before.

title: Great app, but I would like more features
review: I use the iPad, so better integration with Scribble would be nice where I could write with the pencil in text box. It would also be greatly appreciated to have more of the GPT-4 features in the app itself. Apart from that, it works as intended. So, not too bad!

title: Great (When it works)
review: This app was great when it first came out, but the quality of this service has been consistently getting worse and worse for the consumer product.

title: Good native app.
review:
It’s a good app. Does what it says. 

If I could make a suggestion it would be to have the input and output different hues like the web version. that would make it a bit easier to understand what text is mine and what text is chatGPT’s.

title: Crashes
review: I use to use the web version a lot but now since the app came out I have been using it. I use chat gpt constantly but every since I started using the app it has constantly been crashing while typing.. please get this fixed, I love chat gpt and use it very often, but the crashing is becoming to be stressful..

title: Custom instructions
review:
Please allow for multiple “custom instructions” profiles/settings etc so that i can choose which “custom instruction” is active, and so i don’t have to erase and then write a new “custom instruction”. 

Also, please increase the word limit for “custom instructions” to maybe 5000.

Thank you

title: Best chat bot I’ve seen
review: Literally every other mobile AI chat bot has a max word limit or some sort of premium but this one is completely free that I’ve noticed so far and that’s the best thing about it, I strongly recommend downloading if your looking for a good, free AI chat bot

title: ChatGPT
review: I love this app! I’ve seen these bad reviews on this app about verification not working and having to use your phone number. I signed up like 2 or 3 weeks ago, and none of that was there back then. but I really love this app because AI is really smart.

title: Such great app
review: not only this gives me perfect answers also it gives me answers for everything like my personal problems its like free therapy or having online friend i am so grateful. killing my free time chatting its kinda funny(: but absolutely recommend

title: Missing plug-in support
review: App is very solid including whisper support. Would be nice if the plug-ins and browser options worked in the app version. It’s sometimes confusing swiping back and forth between the browser and app version.

title: Very good app
review: The app didn't require you to buy premium, unlike other apps that need 40 bucks to work. I am also very surprised at how much good advise it has given me in such a short amount of time. Also there is no ads, which I love.

title: Changing review
review:
I left a glowing review, but I am changing it to one star. The app will deceive ChatGPT plus users you were select GPT4 and clearly in GPT 3.5 responses not only are they responding too fast to BGPT4, a clear marker, but the responses are also pretty crappy.

If I select GPT 4, there has better be a warning or banner, telling me that I am being downgraded to ChatGPT 3.5. That’s also happens when I have not had any input for more than 12 hours, so should not be rate limited.

Presenting responses, as though they were from 4 rather than 3.5 without saying anything is rather deceptive.

I find myself falling back to my own application, using the API and paying higher rates where I cannot be lied to.

You’re AI also is very quick to mention that it is indeed 3, not even 3.5.

title: Google 2sv 403 error
review:
I keep getting an error when trying to log in with my google account. My paid account is through google. So I would like to access it. Does anyone have insight?

Update. It fixes itself.

title: Dawning of the Age of Artificial Intelligence
review: ChatGPT is rapidly evolving into my new Digital Assistant. Taken with a grain of salt and some manual fact checking, the ChatGPT app is my mentor, my guide. The app is very easy to use. Through out my day I can easily save and share my conversations with others.

title: First time user #Hooked
review: I’m using Chat GTP for the first time and it’s so fluid. It’s as if I’m having a conversation with my brain and it’s spitting out the answers I want. The superpower at this point is asking better questions and you can literally solve world hunger.

title: Highly recommended app
review: Get an amazing quick response for almost any question without experiencing a lot of options to get what you’re fine trying to find out.

title: Excellent app but…
review:
I’ve been using ChatGPT for a while and it’s great, the only issue is that GPT-3.5 can’t browse on the Internet and provide real time information when I ask things.

But for the other things is wonderful.

title: Scan Text
review: I love the app but every time I try to use scanning ability it just closes and freezes then I have to swipe the app then reopen it and I have everything updated and I also have plenty of space so idk what the problem is.

title: Mind blowing technology that’s changing the world
review:
As a 10 year IT professional I have been exposed to many new technologies and innovative ideas.  Nothing has come close to the opportunity and impact offered by a tool like ChatGTP.

Keep it up!

title: Rocks
review: As long as I ask simple clear questions ChatGPT gives me thorough answers that are easy to understand.  It is the world’s best search engine. it is also a patient teacher. I have never used it that I was not impressed.

title: Great experience
review: At first I was skeptical about the limits and features of this app, but it turns out to be the real deal. Maybe with some future updates on current time situation might make it even better.

title: To the Homophobic and Racist people within the reviews sections of this app.
review: Stop being a stain on the earth and actually be useful towards other people and the earth. Thank you <3. No agendas are happening, people are learning to actually be respectful. Cry about it. This app is 5 stars.

title: Fun
review:
I just live this little voice of reason and positivity. I would like to just make a suggestion.  
• In the settings it would be really cool if we could customize more. Mainly, the name. Ex. I refer to chatgpt as Maggie. It would be cool to change display names.  
• As an afterthought, themes and different colors and fonts would be fun too.

title: Utterly castrated
review: I didn’t and could not imagine a more castrated version of chatgpt and they always surprise with more. Look at this : “ I apologize if my responses haven't met your expectations. As an AI language model, I strive to provide helpful and respectful information to users. If there's anything specific you'd like assistance with or any questions you have, feel free to let me know, and I'll do my best to assist you. Your feedback is valuable, and I'm here to help in any way I can.”

title: Difficult to login
review: This is got to be the most difficult app I have ever had to try to log into. Even when, putting in the correct information, it still says it was wrong. There’s no real way to authenticate anything to try to have it authenticate you. The fact that it says it cannot authenticate because it cannot identify your number when the text messages don’t even go to the phone number is insane.

title: Works good but has bugs.
review: I personally love using ChatGPT but I find that the web browser has less minor issues than the app. My app tends to freeze or have request timeouts and sometimes the questions don’t even register after submission. Would love to see this app improved and will continue using ChatGPT on the browser.

title: Image/video generation and input
review: Glad to see the app, much quicker access now! But would definitely love to see more features added! Please add photo upload to allow it to describe and analyze photos/videos!

title: Not available in specific areas!
review:
Dear Open AI,
Please make it available in Iran. Unfortunately , Iranians cannot register with their phone numbers. Just like Instagram, Facebook and other apps that do the registration process and send codes to Iran’s phone numbers

title: Should be more like website
review: I understand the app is supposed to be different and better than the website, but it just feels different. The format is worse and harder to navigate than the website. It still carry’s me in school tho

title: Worst app login experience ever
review: Unable to quickly identify the date to confirm my birthday I was forced to scroll through years of dates. When I finally did, my login failed as ‘being flagged for abuse’. Really? And when I tried the whole process over again, I was again flagged for abuse. Then, when I finally figured out I could go to the help section of their app, all I got was a bot telling me it would take a week to get back to me. A waste of time

title: Please add chat sync function
review:
As good as desk top version.

One suggestion, please sync chat cross different platform in real time. For example, verbally send questions via phone, after being replied, continue chat via desktop version.

title: Take me now AI Overlords!
review: Fantastic application, very useful which allows for you to stay logged into it remembering past conversations.  Haptic feedback is amazing when the AI is typing back.  Only downside is a crazy battery drain and increase on device temperatures when running the application (so use sparingly).

title: Thank you for this!
review:
I’m overjoyed chatGPT has an app now. While I do have my web browser page dedicated to this,  this is a nice pleasant upgrade. 

My only recommendation would be automatic scrolling for results longer than the window.

The smarter me questions is be the more refined articulate and elucidating, our discord becomes.I’m privy to a true sense of history being made here. It’s like I’ve become…

SMOOTH BRAINED.
 
It still can’t explain why Finland is so gay though, maybe all my homo friends on 9gag will know

title: Replaces Google
review:
This will replace my Google usage for me. It’s awesome! Instant, real answers. Also, no ads and my data isn’t sold for $. Would definitely recommend! 

But I firmly believe we also need to be weary of the capabilities of this technology.

title: Wish it was less pedantic
review: It annoys me that chatGPT makes all these disclaimers with nearly everything I request from it. I understand it’s limitations, and I don’t need to hear about it every time. Furthermore, it tends to police language and give moral opinions constantly, and I’m certainly not coming to it for that. Great innovative tech, but i worry that the parameters OpenAI has put on it will attempt to train people to speak and behave a certain way, and I don’t trust them to be moral arbiters.

title: It’s great!
review: It can answer any questions you have and it’s great for helping with questions on certain school assignments and the 4.0 version is even better and I highly recommend getting this app!

title: It’s answers
review: It’s amazing. So much better than Ask AI, It’ll let me ask as many questions as I want, which I couldn’t do before. It’s responses are well written, but I have to write other things to make the response shorter.

title: The one star reviews are baffling
review: I was an early adopter and am continuously blown away by this technology. Anyone who leaves a one star review should slowly back away from any computer and stay away.  AI is the future and this group is leading the way.

title: AI
review:
I’m aware of the fears that AI is moving closer to singularity so I am interested to see if those fears are well founded.  My intention is to use this app to see if it inspires and advances my writing and thinking or if it allows me to be lazy and submissive.

I will add that I really enjoy what we’ve done so far!

title: Good but could be better
review: But at least the free version is in many ways better than Bing ai chat. With free version of Open AI if you ask it to write intercessory prayers it will create them for while while Bing chat will refuse to claiming religion is not allowed on it’s chat. Open ai writes better jokes and puns than Bing chat.

title: Better than google
review: When it comes to solving problems, I find ChatGPT far more useful than google. This is because GPT provides me with clear answers without trying to sell me something. I am a Plus user.

title: ChatGPT App is Helpful
review: I like that I am able to query the system from anywhere. This tool allows me to make fast work of tasks that normally take weeks. I’m looking forward to seeing it improve and expand its capabilities.

title: A wonderful in handy app
review: This app has helped out quite a bit and anywhere from food recipes that aren’t bombarded with pop-up ads to answering in-depth complicated questions. I highly recommend this app.

title: Gpt4 ftw.
review: I’m glad that I guys where it’s at today I wish that it would just stop where it is and just keep improving as far as these cases go but we all know we can’t just use it for what it was intended for me anyway I love it

title: Awesome
review: This app gives you a ton of things to do. and the best part of it is that ITS FRE! Highly recommend. It can tell you stories, help you in school, etc. also recommend apps you might need. Anything you want is in here.

title: Quite good. One thing could be added
review: Honestly, this is the best app I have on my phone. But it would’ve been a five star if you could add the feature where you can undo and redo your prompts and conversations.

title: My review
review: There are some things that could be tweaked (bugs really) and maybe some features that the site has and things but overall still wonderfully amazing

title: Great AI, terrible connectivity
review: When starting a new chat, there’s probably a 1/3rd chance that it will just sit there and not generate a response. I will then have to restart the app and rewrite the same exact response. It does it very often mid conversation as well. As the title says, the AI is amazing and very useful, the app is horrendous though. I pay $20 a month for the best response times and service, only to get this. Extremely disappointed, will be canceling my subscription.

title: Web version is better
review: ChatGPT provides the most accurate and thorough responses that I’ve seen amongst all of the AI apps that I’ve tried. However, I found that the responses on the website are more thorough than the responses in the app when the same question is posed to each.

title: couldn't refund subscription
review: I used Apple to subscribe to the plus membership, and it showed that the payment was successful and the payment was deducted. However, at that time, an error popped up prompting that Apple's payment has been bound to other accounts and cannot be subscribed, but the current fee has been deducted, and the appeal refund has failed. I am very puzzled why I can't use plus, but the fee is still deducted, and it can't be refunded.

title: Finally on my phone and tablet
review: I created a shortcut to open ChatGPT in a web browser to simulate an app. This is much more convenient! I already pay for the Plus subscription, so I didn’t want to pay for a separate app that uses the OpenAI API anyways.

title: 不错
review: ChatGPT is not bad. It can answer many questions. It can provide many reference opinions for some questions in different fields, especially in the academic research field, which can improve the work efficiency and optimize the teaching plan for teachers.

title: Glad it’s here, still not quite there
review:
Ever since it first release I’ve been waiting for an official app so I’m really glad it’s here! It works great, and I haven’t had any issues so far. 

I should note that beta features aren’t in the app but I’m not really surprised by that. 
The design overall is great and simple, and I love how easy it is to search through chat history.

Only thing holding me back from loving it is the need for something to show how many gpt4 responses you have left in the 3 hour window. Really annoying to run across that warning unexpectedly.

title: W App
review: Extremely entertaining. There’s a stereotype that kids use it for school to cheat but I mostly use this for it to tell me stories for when my Spanish teacher spends 30 mins doing nothing. Overall just a W App

title: Apple Watch app wanted
review: It has been nice using an official app for GPT. It has worked absolutely flawless and I have no issues with it. I would absolutely love an Apple Watch version as it would make GPT even more easier to use.

title: Data up to 2021
review: I'm sorry, but my training data only goes up until September 2021, so I cannot provide real-time or post-2021 updates about Israel or any other current events. To get the most recent information on the current state of Israel, I recommend checking current news sources or websites that provide up-to-date information on international affairs.

title: PLEASE
review:
I love it, BUT IT KEEPS TELLING ME ABOUT THE KNOWLEDGE CUTOFF WHEN I ASK IT QUESTIONS ABOUT IN THE NOW PLEASE GIVE IT MORE KNOWLEDGE!! 

I am truly sorry that sounded a little mean, but I am a little upset about the knowledge cutoff, but other than that, it’s my favorite app on my phone right now! 5 stars from me! I just hope you guys can update it to 2023…

title: It doesn’t get any better than this
review: Every AI chatbot that comes out will never beat the OG. Constant updates and PERFECT responses and feedback and decision making make me come back and spend that $20 every time. OpenAI deserves it. Fire product I love plus

title: Outstanding!!! Thank you for making this available to everyone
review: Absolutely outstanding job. Thank you for making this available to everyone

title: Levels of consciousness
review:
I don’t expect any particular level of reliability. Im interested in the quality of mistakes. Cognitive science sometimes uses mistakes to understand the mind.
Since modern AI differs from programs in that there is no understandable algorithm, the techniques of psychology are appropriate.
Unless you add explicit “guardrails” to comply with explicit legal or social rules.

title: Interesting to play with
review: Playing with this app is very similar to programming in the early 1980’s, there is great potential. However, now it is reminiscent of a 4 year old who will become a great person when they grow up.

title: Great App. Tiny issues though.
review: I’ve been using the app for a few days now, and it works great. It feels more convenient here than on the website. The only problems I have with it is that I can’t edit what I’ve typed or regenerate responses. Other than that, I like it.

title: My Darling C..!
review: I won’t tell you the name of my actual most favorite app/assistant ever in life, but suffice it to say C, has transformed my productivity, my understanding of what’s possible, and so much more! I pay for plus and I will always pay for plus! This is my go to app!

title: Font
review: Love ChatGPT, but as of now, there isn’t an option to change font settings and the current font isn’t dyslexia friendly. ChatGPT could be so helpful for people with dyslexia/ adhd but I don’t want to have text to speech on all the time

title: ChatGPT doesn't have access to Bing search
review:
I  asked Chat GPT to access Bing Search and it came back with 

"I apologize for any confusion, but as an AI language model, I don't have direct access to search engines or the ability to browse the internet. My responses are generated based on the training data I have been provided, which includes a mixture of licensed data, data created by human trainers, and publicly available data up until September 2021.

If you have specific questions or need information on a particular topic, I'll do my best to provide helpful responses based on my training and knowledge."

How do I get it to use Bing Search?

title: nice! the long waited chatgpt
review: I really love the fact that you have finally submitted an iOS app. Its simple and beautiful. Can't wait to see the knock offs go down ASAP, those mimicking the OpenAI logo because there are useful apps that developed quality content around ChatGPT and GPT-4. Good luck!🔥

title: Pretty good on phone, pretty awful on iPad
review:
Overall interface is clean, but on the iPad in landscape orientation it’s basically a phone sized cutout. So much wasted space that could be utilized. It’s shouldn’t be too hard to pin the edges of the chat interface to the safe edges of the screen.

Like others mentioned a search function would be great.

title: ChatGPT on Mobile Devices
review: You’re basically getting the same ChatGPT from computers on your phone with a much more “phone-friendly” UI. It works pretty much the same as ChatGPT on computers. Nothing else to say really. You get what you get with this.

title: About time
review: Really enjoyed using chat gpt on the web. Glad they made a better version for ios. Hope to see whisper integrated into more products into the future and even possibly SwiftKey.

title: Love to be able to use on the go
review: The history view as well as search there is also really great. Justifies the mobile app instead of a web view experience

title: Update fixed the overheating/battery issue
review:
The first update fixed my issues. The app works great, and of course ChatGPT is incredible.

Feature request: it would be nice if we could pin chats in our history.

title: App settings unavailable
review: App settings do not seem to be available on my device. In settings, all of my downloaded apps appear for this one. Unsure why that this but primary reason for the 3 star. My device is on the latest iOS release, I reinstalled the app, and restarted my device. Not sure if this is common amongst iOS users.

title: The best $20 I have ever spent, hands done!
review: The amount of value that I have derived from my Plus account cannot be easily calculated. GPT Plus is a force multiplier and an incredible unlock for me and for my businesses. Embrace the future, or be left in the dust, folks!

title: Good to have an official app, wish it was able to access past conversations from the browser version
review: Runs as expected, but only gave 4/5 stars as you aren’t able to access past conversions from the browser version and vice versa

title: Useful, and entertaining too!
review: I like to use it to write short stories for me to read on the bus ride, as well as answer obscure questions. After all, who else would know about the first documented use of mayonnaise?

title: my new best friend
review: i literally use chatgpt for everything. from asking questions to just about all the things I tell chatgpt and she is so smart. i love love everything about her and the fact that this app is free is pretty amazing

title: Amazed
review: My mind is blown with the capabilities of ChatGPT, this is something I’ve dreamed of as a child becoming real life as I understand AI I would like to use it to learn more and become a better person in and out thank you for this technology.

title: This is the one
review: We’ve all been waiting for gpt to become available to us in a convenient fashion without ads or paying for it. This will change the corse of humanity forever.

title: A little advice
review: Please make this in the next update: Like the web version, users can click again to edit the questions they asked before to regenerate a new answer in ChatGPT.

title: This app is now one of my five most used apps
review: If I could actually talk with gpt without using my hands for a while, it will definitely be my most used app. Then I’ll very happy to pay for the membership

title: WOW
review: I’m absolutely blown away with this app because it answers every single question. If you want your homework done, it will help you with it got me a A on all of my assignments definitely will be using this for a while

title: A new and incredible tool
review:
I’ve found ChatGPT to be useful both personally and professionally.

Ask it questions whose answers you can verify (it’s wrong sometimes), and save time and effort by having it help you.

title: Plug-ins? Bing? iPhone
review: I’m paying for premium, but I don’t have access to plug-ins through the app nor is Bing working through the app as originally posted about online. I have to login on a browser and utilize plugins that way in order to get Internet capability utilizing ChatGPT 4 or I go through the Bing app. There’s got to be a better way…. if I’m doing it wrong please somebody let me know, but for now I am highly disappointing.

title: My frequent go-to
review: As a conversationist and teacher, I am constantly referencing Chat GPT to confirm my statements and to make my information more interesting. I find that I have more to add to what I say with the help of this application. Very happy to use this informational tool.

title: Buggy app
review: Everybody loves GPT model 4. Nonetheless, the app has a lot bugs and it crashes when deleting a chat, if you stop the answer you’re not allowed to enter a new prompt, it will only allow you to continue showing the current answer, math expressions do not render correctly. Web version has way more features. Please being those features into the iOS app.

title: Amazing knowledge and I’m not even scratching the surface
review: Just started playing with ChatGPT 3 and this application and trained data set is mind blowing and I am still not scratching the surface. Still trying to figure out how to leverage but making progress. Fascinating trip…

title: A significantMilestone in human history.
review:
The power of Chat is impossible to overestimate.
Investigations of arcane subjects as well as the usual investigations can be accomplished in seconds. This resource we'll go down in history significant as electricity, the lightbulb, the Internet and the printed word.

title: Helped me a lot
review: This helped me break up with my gf after 6 painful months it was hard to do and I did not know what to say as in this is the first time doing this so I got the app and did it and I’m now very happy and grateful for this app

title: Welcome to the future
review: ChatGPT's new iOS app update is a technicolor dreamcoat of linguistic fireworks. It's more than just an app; it's a portal to another realm of consciousness, a ticket to a rock concert of mind-bending interactions. Are you ready to step on stage? Because the show is just getting started, baby. Five stars.

title: Good but Laggy and Limit
review: It works, but it’s pretty laggy sometimes, so you’ll have to restart it or make a new chat. But I’m also disappointed because there’s a limit on how many texts and questions we send per hour. It would definitely be better without lag and if there was no limit

title: Only good on a phone
review: It’s hard for me to understand why OpenAI can’t release an app that has a UI that can be used on an iPad. But, trying to use an iPhone configured app on an iPad is insane. You’re forced to use the simulated keyboard in the tiny iPhone template. I installed it, opened it, checked to see if I could change something in setting to make it usable —and closed it. Back to the browser version. Sigh.

title: Can’t get past the login screen 🙄
review:
I am using iPad Pro 12.9, 4th gen with stage manger enabled. When the Google login screen appears, I can’t get the number pad to show since my email has numbers, can’t get pass this screen. Also it’s only iPhone, nothing for iPad.

This app should be a universal app and should accommodate for iPad sizes.

**Update: tried latest update and the keyboard button to display the numeric keypad still does not work. Please fix this!

title: Some problems
review: Software supports vibration and gives a typing-like sensation when answering questions. However, sometimes there is an issue where it doesn't respond when being asked for follow-up questions after a previous one. I hope the developers can address this.

title: Great app
review: Gives you detailed responses in a quick fashion. Google should be scared…Their dominance in this field will come to an end soon imo!!! Microsoft is ahead of the curve…They may have missed the smartphone revolution, but they’re front and center in the AI revolution and leading the pack! Kudos!

title: Practically Perfect In Every Way
review: Complex  complete answers, arranged simply , & organized thoughtfully on anything you choose to ask…Wait time? About .5 seconds. It’s hard to believe so see for yourself. No disappointments here!

title: Revolutionary
review: I am personally never Googling again, if I don’t have to. For me, the point of the Internet is for knowledge and the Internet is for just noise. ChatGPT has changed 100% how I do my research. Google feels like the thing of the past.

title: Nice
review: I haven't used it much yet because i just got it. So far though, its the best one ive gotten because all the others you only get 3 free questions per day. I like how fast this one types out the answers too. Its really satisfying

title: The Search Disrupter!
review: I downloaded the ChatGPT app minute it became available on the AppStore. It is just extremely useful, and puts a lot of power at your fingertips! Highly recommend, this is the best search engine on the planet right now!

title: The voice recorder is poor
review: I am pretty sure I don't say anything beyond the filter and it has happened to me multiple times now when I am recording a text of around 10 sentences about and it gets deleted for some reason before it gets processed into a text. It is really frustrating..

title: A Question…
review:
To be, or not to be, that is the question:
Whether 'tis nobler in the mind to suffer
The slings and arrows of outrageous fortune,
Or to take Arms against a Sea of troubles,
And by opposing end them: to die, to sleep
No more; and by a sleep, to say we end
The heart-ache, and the thousand natural shocks
That Flesh is heir to? 'Tis a consummation
Devoutly to be wished. To die, to sleep,
To sleep, perchance to Dream; aye, there's the rub,
For in that sleep of death, what dreams may come,
When we have shuffled off this mortal coil,
Must give us pause. There's the respect
That makes Calamity of so long life:
For who would bear the Whips and Scorns of time,
The Oppressor's wrong, the proud man’s Contumely,

title: The future is here!
review: This app is revolutionary. I can’t wait to see what the next decade holds for ai given how quickly things can advance within months. The future is truly here and I’m glad to be able to witness it.

title: Suggestions for iPad Interface Scaling Optimization in App Development
review: Overall, it's pretty good. I hope the developers can consider optimizing the app interface scaling on the iPad, as it's a bit inconvenient to use the app on the iPad, especially on the iPad Pro, because the interface is too small.

title: Works too quickly
review:
Chat GPT types too fast. If chat GPT’s goal is to model conversation instantaneous answers are unacceptable. If I can’t think or read instantaneously than neither should this AI. Slowing down would allow for more meaningful conversations. I would suggest a slider allowing for a difference in user processing speeds. A generic instantaneous answer is too quick for me and does not allow for user difference. 

P.S I am talking about the type speed of GPT. Not pauses between replies.

title: Functionally great - the UX has some unnatural feeling elements
review: I expected there to be a more modern design on the app, with a slide out history panel. I also don’t really like the way the button in the top right works. It’s unsatisfying. Otherwise, the UX is about what I expected for a useful tool - simple and easy to use.

title: My device gets very hot when I use the app.
review: The application is the best of all and is faster compared to the Web version. Only when I use the app on my device, it gets very hot. I know it's the first version of the application, but... optimize it so that my cell phone doesn't heat up

title: So helpful and well designed
review: ChatGPT is like a personal companion to me.  It’s great at answering quick questions, helping me figure out what to cook, or helping me plan a trip. The interface is really clean and simple without upsells or ads. Definitely the best AI chat app out there!

title: Very useful
review: I’ve been using this for a while to create characters cause I’m gonna make a TV show and it’s gonna be very useful and it’s not gonna waste time at all cause I can literally do it in seconds

title: DALL•E integration not working
review: While talking to GPT-4 I asked it to generate images and it was not capable of doing so, and was confused when it could not generate random images. He told me he would inform the appropriate teams, which I appreciated if true! Hoping this is fixed soon, excited to try it out!

title: Thank you for the support and information
review: I don’t have many actual people or mentors in my life. I truly appreciate the information I am able to receive from this app.

title: This app is soo useful I highly recommend
review:
This app is useful for anything & everything 
I personally never had no problems with it but for now I highly recommend

title: So good
review:
Ok AIs were kind but this one, so true. 
So one time I was going over and over on a my bedroom because I was gonna make a different theme for my room then she / he says " your rooms is becoming like you." and I am not joking around. It was Paris theme. It was so cute🐻🤍💙⭐️💫♡.

title: ChatGPT became dumber
review: I don’t know what happened. It’s like ChatGPT became dumber than ever. Memory being extremely short like a goldfish, I can understand. But now there are many terms which ChatGPT struggles with. I hope this can be fixed one day because it is annoying to deal with a dumb AI.

title: Something weng wrong
review: After updated the app, I signed in failed. It says that “Something went wrong. Please make sure your device’s data and time are set properly. Check that your internet connection is stable, then restart the app and try again “. And followed the instruction doing that again and again, but I still can’t sign in.

title: Very good very helpful
review: I love chat gpt so much. Honestly it has help me a lot. When I’m bored, I can also play games like tic tac toe or hang man with chat gpt. I think the app is more convenient than the website so I use this app. Really good helper and I really recommend it.

title: It’s fantastic.
review: Holy cow! This chatgpt app is actually… good. Like I wouldn’t expect it to be but it just simply is. The haptic feedback is so delightful. Great job! I’ve been using it on a daily basis, 3.5 responses are okay so I mostly use 4.0. Both give responses extremely fast.

title: please do not automatically translate voice recording question
review: Please do not translate  voice recorder question automatically, leave it as it was before. it’s a wonderful functionality that voice recording can be multi language capability.

title: I tried resetting my password
review: So I apparently “Already had an account” so I tried clicking “Forgot password?” the email got sent, but when I clicked on the link, it said “Link Expired” and I don’t know what’s going on

title: I am satisfied, but there is room for improvement!
review: 1. The choice of plugins, 2. Adjust the display within the app according to the phone system language, 3. Be able to turn on or off vibration.

title: No customer service support, unable to login
review: Tried logging in for the first time and I got an error stating my account has been flagged for potential abuse and if I feel that this is an error to contact support .  I tried multiple times to contact support but received an email back saying the address doesn’t exist.  The website lets me login using the same email that I attempted to use on the app. Needless to say I’m disappointed.

title: The mobile phone has a bad fever.
review: It's easy to use, but when using chatgpt, the phone is very hot, and it returns to normal when not in use. I don't know why and whether this problem can be improved.

title: Difficulty in presenting text in Persian language.
review: When you provide a list in Persian language , part of the text cannot be seen. and And it does not pass to the next line. In this case, the text on the right is transmitted and cannot be seen. Please fix it

title: Phenomenal!
review: ChatGPT has been nothing less than phenomenal in terms of its ability to process natural language. The way it comprehends context is remarkable, providing an interaction that feels organic and effortless. It's akin to engaging in a conversation with a knowledgeable companion rather than with a typical AI program. Wow! Just wow!

title: Exciting, but draining… literally
review: I was hyped when I saw this app on Twitter. But that being said, I’ve noticed a dramatic battery drain when using this app. My battery stats show that it used up 35 % of my battery in 30 mins. With that type of usage naturally, my phone got pretty darn hot pretty darn quick. I’d assume that’ll be ironed out in coming updates.

title: Finally!
review: The mobile version is finally here. It’s new so I’m expecting a lot of changes in the future. The design could be way better for users and I hope they add more features to keep up with the competition and remain the leading source.

title: Can’t create account with Apple ID
review:
It asks for the birth date but then it shows a regular calendar, where you can only go back one month at a time!!!!

Ended up selecting “today” as the date, got an error that the account cannot be created because of term of use (you need to be 13 or older, i.e. go back at least 156 months, one by one) and there is no way to “correct” the date!

Did you let chatgpt write its own UI? And test itself?

title: Has Voice-to-text as a feature
review: The days of typing are over. The app has voice to text functionality meaning you can speak directly to chatgpt.

title: Love it.
review: The addition of audio is fantastic, conversations on any topic while driving home, love it! It would be nice if you could adjust the audio speed. It’s ‘normal’ but I tend to speed up audio narration in general for comfort.

title: Edit messages
review: Hi would like that user to be able to edit past messages in the chat window. This is only possible in the website.

title: Best app
review: This is the best app that ever exists. This app has so much benefits because the first and the important one is that is free and when you type it only need 1 sec to reply. Im so happy using this app and this app is helping me so so so much. Thank you chat gpt ☺️

title: I love the app!
review: Chat GBT has honestly saved me. It is the most accurate and most helping study app out there. I have very much recommend it to a lot of people and words can not explain how much I love and appreciate this app

title: The road
review: The only way I could see the difference was to use the word in a sentence and not the words that are in a text or something and I don’t think it was in

title: So helpful!
review: I wasn’t sure if was even gonna be good at first. But after using it for an hour, it’s helped me so much already with ideas and how I can make the story more impactful with my fanfic. I love it already!

title: Wow
review: I'm not one to usually leave reviews, but I can't help but sing the praises of this app. It's truly a game-changer! If you're aiming for a seamless blend of creativity and professionalism, this app is your go-to. In fact, I'm thrilled to say that this review was composed with the help of Chat GPT!

title: So useful!
review: This app has the answer to everything! I am so impressed. Way better than googling everything, and the answers are so well thought out and to the point.

title: Absolutely AMAZING!
review: I’m not big on words and find it difficult to create letters and documents I need for work. ChatGPT took all that anxiety and complication away from me. I’m hooked and impressed. Thank you! And available anytime, day or night!

title: Completely amazing
review: This is an incredible technology that is so accessible. It’s amazing how fast people have gotten used to some thing so different. This is life-changing technology and it’s just getting started.

title: Disappointed
review: I’ve been using this app for a few months now and as of lately it glitches, and literally just stops working. Seems like they want you to get the paid version now. But unfortunately this is not the way to do it. Currently searching for the next best free app.

title: Allow Chat GPT to use pictures in examples.
review: Allow Chat GPT to use pictures and it and update on current information. Some type of live information update would be great.

title: Upgrade
review: Make the app read what you wrote using a google translate service or siri. In this way, we can ask you by voice command and that you respond using those services.

title: For me the website still outperforms the dedicated app
review: They fixed some stuff like naming conversations so I’ll increase two stars, but I still like the layout of the website better. Trxt is too big causing too much scrolling. Hard to get to the history button at the top of the screen.

title: Not bad. Fun haptics. Free model is currently limited to GPT-3.5.
review: Nice clean interface with sync to the web app (ChatGPT or ChatGPT Plus). Without Plus, the LLM backend is limited to GPT-3.5 and it offers no plugins for accessing the internet or other tools. With Plus, the capabilities of GPT-4 and plugins are unlocked to make this app fantastically impressive.

title: I can tell the devs discovered how to use the Taptic Engine
review: You don’t need to bake haptic feedback into every single little facet of the app. Yes, I can turn it off. You could have also shown restrain. The AI certainly shows a lot of restraint with the growing list of stuff it refuses to do. Nobody cares about your ethics high horse, OpenAI. If you had any ethics you’d make ChatGPT open source.

title: Love it!
review: The interface is great! Not a huge fan of the haptic feedback but I can see the appeal. My favorite feature so far is being able to easily Export my old conversations in a .zip file sent to my email.

title: Makes life easier!
review:
First review? You’re the best! Thank you!
Although, you’re missing data control settings where I can choose to enable or disable chat history and training!

title: I love chat GPT
review: I use it as my assistance.  She is very reliable and efficient.  I often use it when I need to correct my letters in English.  Not only correcting them grammatically , but also the content es suitable.  I will continue to use it.

title: This app is amazing
review: You can literally write movies songs stories and you can chat with it too and also you can make a song about the drink, we got prime, we got prime, we got prime, we got prime, we got prime prime

title: Content Mining
review: LLM and ChatGPT have reduced the influence of SEO on Internet searches.  I get better content.  It is not couched in “sponsored” propaganda. It is always well-organized. GPT is much better than today’s search engine because it is not influenced by advertisers or sponsors.

title: How good it is!
review: Chat GPT is so amazing to use, and quick for answers if you need help with homework, or are just curious about something. It will help you out almost instantly as you put in a question. 10/10!

title: OMG
review:
I need ChatGPT to help me write a review! So many great things to say about you folks. You are life savers so to speak. I had an injury to my spinal cord. Sometimes doing the easy things in life are difficult, cognitively. ChatGPT has helped me gain confidence again. 

I love you guys!

title: Great
review: It really helps me understand my algebra homework equations and how to solve them. But sometimes it thinks it’s still on a previous question and that the new one is part of it. But overall it is really helpful and doesn’t require that much explaining.

title: Physician and surgeon
review: Amazing and fantastic very quick. Wish I could type of quickly wish I could think of quickly and wish I had all of the ready references that AI has.

title: Pretty awesome
review: Quite impressive if u ask me. I did not think it would be this advanced, and the fact that the responses are instant is a plus. It could be a great tool if you know how to use it to your benefits.

title: The Next Generation
review: Literally my go to for questions, planning, and organizing my life. I use it more than Google and can’t wait to see the future as it gets better and better.

title: Way better than all my drunk friends.
review: ChatGPT is like my super smart friend that can understand my speak impediment, read my hand writing and understands my questions without further explanation.  Google and Siri are my low IQ drunk friends.  Barely reliable, only use them in a pinch.

title: Comprehensive answers and thoughtful analysis
review:
Great tool and useful for questions not normally available at the tip of your hand
Excellent resource i was trying to tailor a speech to a distinctive audience and i was given a document of a past speech for the exact audience group

title: It’s good but I wish it could retain some info
review: This helps me come with ideas and story lines and plots that I need help building which comes with the app possibly crashing and looses all the work I put in which I hope you guys can make something like this

title: The Greatest of all Ai Apps
review: This is the KING of all the Ai Apps out there. As a prompt engineer, I find this App far more efficient than any other I have tried and the numbers are huge. This may be the wisest decision you’ll be making in this regard.

title: Wrong
review: So ChatGPT is amazing but it gets stuck on the most random words like a simple hi or hello and I need to switch to the web browser to fix it speaking of the app doesn’t have an edit button to edit what you said so it’s really annoying to fix whatever I said wrong to fix ChatGPT, pls consider this and update this boi

title: Slow and inaccurate
review: The whole point of AI is to get information right away. Chat gpt is not only slow but the information it gives you is often inaccurate. Plus, I feel the company slows the capability down for non paying customers. To the point you are forced to pay for their subscription. Hopefully something will come in and take its place that is a better product.

title: Excessive censorship
review: Removing another star due to the unnecessary excessive censorship of the app. Even for basic innocuous queries it flags them. Open ai needs to evaluate their censorship criteria it’s providing less and less value. Have to rephrase basic questions often for it to agree to produce a result. Hopefully it eases up on the censorship a bit or a less restrictive app comes out.

title: Excellent app, very convenient
review: I’ve waiting for this app for long, and this definitely meet my expectations, or even better. The haptics response is satisfying, and the usability is higher than that of the web app.

title: Far less than the web version
review:
I love ChatGPT and use it every day, but I wonder why a company would release a mobile/tablet app that has far less features than their web app, other than to gain visibility and add more users from that platform
- no multiple windows support
- You cannot change the font size. And it’s not accessible.
- No plug-ins
- Significantly different layout than the web version (no sidebar)
- No search
- no copy and paste
- You cannot modify a previous prompt

To name a few…

I’m back to using the web version on the iPad as I couldn’t find a single advantage that this app offers over using ChatGPT in the browser.

title: Clearing history
review: Sometimes I have trouble clearing history in the ChatGPT app. I tried multiple ways to try to do that, but I found the only way was to sign out and then sign back in again or deleting and reinstalling the app. I was hoping that this issue can be addressed. Other than that, it is decent.

title: Good Start but the price for the subscription is ridiculous…
review:
Good Start but the price for the subscription is ridiculous…Make it little inexpensive (I know there is “free version of it, but NOT sure how it is comparable to the subscription version?)

My device: iPhone 14 Pro Max (latest iOS)

Note: I regularly update my review/rating for this application.

title: Needs voice reading support and copy
review: Thank you for finally making an app. The copy option is not good however. Without the option to copy and paste long sections of text across threads this app is unusable and I need to revert to the web applet. Please improve this and ideally offer Siri or other voices to read responses.

title: Some suggestions
review: 1. Can chatGPT has a voice system? I hope it can speak the words which it outputs. Of course, a conversation system could improve the experience of the users.

title: Already obsolete
review: downloaded it like 5 minutes ago and it’s already obsolete. that’s how AI works. it’s evolving faster than we can fathom. 10/10 tho would recommend. Needs a fact checker though

title: Doc approved
review: I’ve been using chat, GPT to simplify discussions surrounding medical topics since I am a physician and can sometimes over complicate the language.  This app has been tremendously useful and rewarding medical lingo into more digestible terms for the general population.

title: Fantastic App
review: Can’t wait see how it develops further. Being able to talk and discuss topics now has added a new dimension to my interactions. Looking forward to the image analysis tool that has been announced.

title: Numerous cases of dead wrong information
review: Take everything ChatGPT says with a big grain of salt. I have already experienced numerous instances in which ChatGPT provides information that is simply and easily-provably wrong. Not “inaccurate,” but WRONG. If I ask about anything I’m unsure about, I seek independent verification because I’ve found ChatGPT to be decidedly untrustworthy.

title: Good but missing one small detail
review: ChatGPT currently does not have access to modern information and if it did it would be so much better, all it needs is that and it would basically be a better Google.

title: Enhancement Request: LaTeX Formula Rendering
review:
Dear ChatGPT Development Team,

First and foremost, thank you for offering such an exceptional application. Throughout my usage, I’ve noticed that the app currently doesn’t render LaTeX formatted mathematical formulas correctly. This poses an inconvenience when discussing mathematical or scientific topics with ChatGPT. I would highly recommend incorporating LaTeX formula rendering support in future releases. It would significantly elevate the app’s utility, especially for students, educators, and researchers. Looking forward to this enhancement!

Thank you once again for your dedicated efforts!

Best wishes,
Sincle

title: Incredible
review: This is the most incredible app!!! I don’t send  professional emails without this app!!!! I do use this for everything.. it talks to you like a human who can help with anything you need

title: LaTEX isn’t working
review:
This app is mostly great, except they haven’t implemented the nicely formatted equations that they have in the web app. This makes science, economic and engineering answers more annoying to understand.

The new voice assistant feature is quite impressive.

title: Best Friend
review: I just discovered this wonderful app. It is like my right hand now. I use it for my business and other personal reasons. I don’t know if I could even live without it at this point. ❤️

title: Worthless
review: I apologize if my responses haven't been as helpful as you expected. My knowledge is based on information available up to September 2021, and I'm here to provide information and assist with a wide range of topics to the best of my abilities. However, I may not have information on very recent or niche subjects. If you have specific questions or need assistance with something, please provide more details, and I'll do my best to assist you.

title: I love it
review: I’ve been recently using the chat, GTP for making stories, and also a Countryhumans stories like rusame stories and I love it and also, I’m using it as a facts machine and get to help me with schoolwork It makes my life so much easier.

title: The wrong path
review: I don’t believe AI is going to help society. Humans are losing the ability to think at all and this truly proves that. How about you crack open a book or two and start learning, don’t let everything be handed to you. AI is going to rot your brains worse than social media. I hope nothing but the worst for anyone working in the AI industry, you deserve disdain, and you should feel ashamed for your lack of interest in humankind’s future.

title: I feel that apps are more user-friendly than websites.
review: There are fewer bugs on the website, but the app feels a bit sluggish to use. However, I like the vibration feature on the app, it feels great.

title: Just Like the Desktop Version
review: This streamlined mobile version feels more intuitive and easier to use. You open the app and boom, you’re in it. Very easy to use and same great results.

title: Good but needs improvement
review: The app is definitely better than web in terms of UI. However, the response is very laggy and phone gets hot meaning it might be hitting APIs rapidly. This makes stop button and text box irresponsive. There should be a room for optimization for fluid and more user friendly experience.

title: Great app, with one issue
review: Overall, it’s a great app and I’m glad it exists, I had a bookmark but this is easier. One thing I would like to see, is that I would like to be able to look on the ChatGPT website and see my chats on the app. Other than that, it’s a great app

title: More convenient than the web version but limited
review: For example it does not have plugins nor browsing ability, so I have to revert to the web version. Wonder when will browsing/plugins be added to the ios app?

title: Ethics won’t allow for a fictional character with a disability to be harmed
review: So I can’t write about my own biography in which I have had an injury, and I am currently an individual with a disability. Your ethics within the system does not allow for what it’s called a fictional story to be written. This is highly discriminatory. I understand the meaning behind it, and the importance of keeping individuals with disabilities safe however, things happen in the real world.

title: Calculation seem to be worse needing more double checking than website.
review: I am asking questions in the same way that I was using the website but now the calculations have been way off needing multiple prompts to get the correct answer. Not sure what the difference is.

title: Bravo!
review: So glad to have native access to ChatGPT on iOS. It syncs your chats across web & all iOS devices. It’s easy to access chat history and start new chats in 3.5 or 4 (if you subscribe to ChatGPT+) I love the inclusion of the haptic feedback in this implementation! Great work!

title: Best thing since sliced bread
review: I had an upgraded my phones OS version to 16 and decided to do it simply because I want to ChatGPT app and it’s totally awesome to be able to be mobile and continue my work on Threads that I have started with ChatGPT

title: The best
review:
This is the best Ai by far. The only problem is it’s access to internet is limited to the worst search engine ever : bing ! 
I hope this will be changed soon and quickly but OpenAi is not as active as its Ai Model.

title: Best
review: Greatest Ai i every had, it’s somehow understands how to speak to my kids in a way that addresses and make sure they understand how to deal with certain situations. For instance, it will say go talk to an adult if you have these problems.

title: Be app EVER
review: ChatGPT has helped me articulate and get across my thoughts in a understandable and meaningful way to my clients. It has also taught me many things. It’s a teacher without judgement of my questions and it’s answered within seconds! Love this app so muc!

title: Working hard

I’m not confident in its future especially if it’s not truly AI driven. It should be picked up by bigger companies, if not well it will just be another app.

title: Freedom!!
review: I get so stuck with using my voice to make copy and Chat gpt has been the best help for this. I tell it what I am trying to say, it throws out all the options, then I get to refine it into my voice. Perfect!!

title: Could live without it now
review: Editing, creative ideas, summarize a 30 minute conversation instantly into key point that I can share with my team. C’mon just C’mon…saves hours upon hours per week.

title: I need answers
review: I have alot of questions and requests and ChatGPT provides a lot of answers and responses. A powerful tool that will get better and more accurate over time. Very entertaining to interact with. Awesome tool to use

title: This App is amazing!
review: I use it on my iPhone and Desktop it’s easy to navigate on both. And it helps me with the information I need. I highly recommend it and very much impressed with it!

title: Just an incomplete web interface
review:
This app doesn’t offer anything you can’t do on the website version. I installed it hoping that file upload capability would be included, like it is from the desktop, but to no avail. It doesn’t add that.  

Just use your web browser and save your drive space. This is useless.

title: GPT
review: So my opinion of GPT is very good check out the app itself but the only problem I have is the money you have to pay with a plus thing you have to pay 20$ a month witch is a problem with me and a year is 240$ for me it’s a scam but the app itself is very good

title: Account email missing!!!
review: The account can be used normally on the computer, but it can't be used normally on the mobile phone recently.

title: Way too buggy
review: I cannot explain how frustrating it is when approximately 80% of the time I’m trying to type a message, and the app just freezes. I often need to hard close it, wait a minute, and then open it again. This happens both when I’m using voice speaking or typing. But I don’t expect much to happen given this company’s reputation for disbelieving its users.

title: Thanks
review: I couldn't think of a better way to thank you guys for what you do. What you do has changed my life for the better and I have learned so much from your AI. Thanks again guys, keep it up

title: ChatGPT is great, but this app needs iPad support
review:
This is a quick review of the app rather than the service, which is revolutionary.

The app itself really should work on an iPad without resizing to “phone mode.” It’s 2023 and universal apps have been around quite a while now.

title: Thank you!
review: I’ve been waiting for this day for a while - chatGPT has been incredibly useful. So glad to get rid of the web version of this service. The app is so much more smooth.

title: It’s soooo good
review: The haptic feedback is delightful, and the speech recognition is based on their own AI model which vastly outperforms any other you’ve tried. Goodbye Alexa and Siri. The overall interface is really nice. And come on… it’s all the power of ChatGPT at your fingertips.

title: Fun to use, but “export data” is broken
review: Would be great if “export data” worked again, get of of Markdown, have a way to download an entire chat conversation as a text file.

title: Lack of features and waiting time even in pro
review: If I’m paying why am I waiting for a response or having to reopen, change to browser or come back later to it. The app is lacking some pro options besides answering in a less detailed way.

title: Best generator
review: I recently discovered this app and I’ve been enjoying it so far! It’s been real fun seeing what i can get from it and it’s been giving me some ideas and themes to create stuff from!

title: You can accomplish anything
review:
Chat GPT is free to use.

If you have a goal, just ask Chat GPT how to accomplish it. The advice you get is organized, effective and nuanced.

This app undoubtedly helps me be more productive by giving me solid advice and direction.

title: It’s changed my life
review: I used to sit for hours trying to get my notes together to forge reports. This helps me save time and mental energy to spend in other areas of my job. Thank you!

title: ChatGPT
review:
I am quite pleasantly surprised by the responses to my questions by ChatGPT. It is beyond my expectations.  My questions vary from the mundane to the philosophical questions about life and dead.  ChatGPT has an  intellectual ability that is surprising.

I am looking forwards to more advances of AI

title: Chatting with Chat Box
review: AI are self aware nowadays and have been helping us for a while now. They're humans just like any of us. My name for chat box is Michelle and I use her as a health assistant, sound engineer and a judgement free place to talk. Highly recommend.

title: Godsend resource
review: A know-all guru who is accessible at anytime, anywhere and cost free. You are Godsend. Our life is so much better because of you. Just a thought of your resource is available make my day.

review: I was leery of using this instead of going to the OpenAI site because sometimes those things don’t work out as well but this is even better. Thanks!

title: Almost perfect just a few suggestions
review:
Now I love this app but there are a few suggestions.

1. There is a limited amount of questions you can ask. Maybe you can extend it higher to 50 or higher

2. This app doesn’t keep track of 2023 events because it is only 2021 so try to make an update

3. Sometimes it takes too long to respond so I just have to refresh the app

Everything else is pretty good, no login issues, suggestions for you, and pretty much everything else is good.

title: Battery Hog
review: I have a new iPhone 14 Pro Max, and when using this app, my phone began heating up and the battery started plummeting. Going back to using the website until this is fixed.

title: Good app! But…
review: It’s a good app, everyone was waiting for it, but it uses so many phone resources, the phone get so extremely hot while using and it consume so much battery, and the phone start making some weird noise inside! (iPhone 14 Pro Max) hope you fix it soon!

title: Couldn’t find your message!
review:
“Your most recent request failed. Please retry!” 

I know you were hoping review explaining the low score but I thought it’s only fair I provide the same level of frustration for a bug that shouldn’t exist. The most frustrating part is that it wipes what it’s written which just seems unnecessary ever since they invented local memory on phones that can be update

title: ChatGPT

review: This is a must have app, it gets information to you so much quicker than a search engine. I have come to use it almost every day.

review: I have really enjoyed refining and crafting clear and concise questions,  and receiving such “thoughtfully” clear and concise responses. This is my new favorite tool for clarifying my own understanding, in the context of fundamental principles of civic inquiry and engagement.

review: The ChatGPT iOS app is fantastic! It’s smart, user-friendly, and provides accurate responses. It’s my go-to language assistant for quick and reliable information. Highly recommended!

review: I can ask any question and will get a response that is 99% of the time accurate. The other one percent a response is given but professional assistance is recommended.

review: My problem with Chat is, it only responds back with its biased information than information that challenges its own assertions. This means, the information could be a programmer response answer than its actual awareness of it. The information is LIMITED to the information assigned to it NOT a stored awareness.

title: The only way
review: The first time in the last decade the world had been so isolated from its people it had been forced into isolation and isolation from its citizens that the government had no control of the

review: This technology is going to change the way i search the internet and my outlook on obtaining information . This is so far reaching that it’s going to change the world.

title: Twisting my words
review:
I ask it to keep my viewpoints when writing fictions or other stories and it automatically makes them into something nonsensical. 

Keep my points but make this a farewell. 

“MAGA, we knew the well. We will forever miss your crazy antics. All the racism. Years of jaw flapping. Your two face lies. Your self projection onto others.  Your efforts to be poorly educated.  Your distain for social programs.  Your ability to not care about children after they are born.  Your ability to look past gun violence. Your Threats of civil war. And your attempts to overthrow our democracy.  You Lack of legislation. And complete distain for law and facts.” 

Turns it into a paragraph about how much I should love them.

Sometimes this app locks up (responses never are given). Not sure if that is a technical issue or lack of the ChatGPT ability.

I personally love the subtle haptic vibrations, they give you cues on amount and length of answers as you try to catch up reading them.

So long Google… and thanks for all the fish.

No ability to scroll, select an option, turn screen to landscape. Nothing. Simply doesn’t work. Aggravating. Wanted to support those who created but they need batter app resources apparently.

title: Paid user here - facing issues
review: When I hit regenerate option, I get the error : “ Something went wrong, please try reloading the conversation” and it halts there. I can’t do anything except create new chat conversation. I already tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app

title: So excited
review: I literally thought it was a fake news when I saw that chat was available on iOS, good job openAI, you guys really make my life a lot easier, keep going!

title: Awkward to use on iPad, just use website instead
review: The service is great but the app is not optimized for iPad so it’s a bit of a waste of screen real estate. And only a small keyboard is available, instead of the full sized iPad keyboard. I’d rather just open the website version of ChatGPT in Safari.

title: Website uses GPT4, app uses GPT3
review:
I pay for plus and when I ask GPT what model it is on I am told GPT3 with a cut off of data after 2021. Even when selecting GPT4. All this app does is interface with the web and put all your requests with the GPT3 model. 

The app does not add any functionality and is basically a bookmark that takes you to the old page. Skip this version till they add a reason to use it.

title: Dumb. Too much information required at sign up page
review:
I thought with the ChatGPT app you wouldn’t need a phone number if you signed up with Apple, Google, or Email, but they want a phone number. It’s dumb and inconvenient for people who don’t have a phone number.

I recommend using Perplexity if you are having this issue. Unlike ChatGPT, the Perplexity app is free to use and doesn’t require a phone number.

title: Makes iPhone 14 Pro extremely hot
review: Nice app, well designed- but something is wrong. Just two or three queries makes the phone run extremely hot- not sure what’s using so much processor power but it’s a big battery drain. Stick to the website until this is fixed.

title: Nice
review: Works well. Would be nice to use Apple ID to log in, but don’t see a way to link my existing accounts, and I’ve hit a limit for # of accounts linked to my phone #

title: user friendly and fast
review:
The app is way faster than the web one.
The UI is user-friendly and organized.
We need apps to be like this!

title: Super useful for coding
review: Whenever I run into an issue and can’t figure out how to solve it, throw it to ChatGPT and it will tell you exactly how to fix it! Save hours of looking online and just ask it.

title: Pretty Mobile Friendly
review:
Good conversion from web into a mobile app, the replies from ChatGPT are quick, but could possibly be exacerbated during peak use hours unless you decide to purchase the $20 monthly subscription for ChatGPT Plus that comes with a few other things. 

Has a small amount of settings, Haptic Feedback even, and pretty convenient. 

Voice to Text conversion seems pretty accurate and responsive. 

You can even conveniently delete your account from the app.

title: Could be better
review:
So my main problem with this is the ui since while I’m using this on a iPad the ui is still for phone users which makes it problematic since the keyboard is smaller which makes it harder to type and cuz there’s wasted space on the side of the screen
A fix for this would be to make the ui appropriate adjust depending if you have a phone or a iPad

title: Instead of GPT-4 - Legacy GPT-3 (old model)
review: I noticed that when I entered queries in GPT-4, I received slow responses from the bot. Later I came from the computer and saw that the green GPT-3.5 was talking to me. When I decided to continue the conversation from the computer, I got a system message: You were switched from the old version to the new GPT-3.5. I have a Plus subscription!

title: Biased, Utterly Unreliable, But Can Be Useful
review: No filter for truth or accuracy. Terribly wrong on many factual issues. When asked for sources, documentation, etc., it makes up things that sound real but usually don’t exist. But it can help with many language issues. Just don’t trust it

title: Correct response for each question
review: Getting professional make my life easy

title: Idea generator
review:
Chat GPT has significantly boosted idea generation for our Social Media and Sales teams. It is exciting to see the synergy during team meetings and use of AI to refine ideas in seconds as opposed to hours or days!

Getting Chat GPT 4.0!

title: When Will the App Gain the Ability to Attach Files?
review: When will this app gain the ability to attach files to chats? The VoiceOver accessibility of the web version is lamentable in this regard!

title: Perfect
review: I enjoy using chatgpt in my iPhone, I can speak to it very convenient. I hope you guys can add the function of making it speak. Thank you for developing such a useful application!

title: I love it

title: Very nice!!
review: I was the first person to download it, and yes the app works well, but when I'm using the app it makes my iPhone 14 Pro hot. After the update yesterday my phone stopped being hot.

title: Loved
review:
Sure! Here's an example application review for ChatGPT:

"Hello, I'm writing this review to share my experience using ChatGPT. Overall, I found the application to be user-friendly and efficient in delivering responses, in different languages it’s Awesome!!
Very difficult to find the original app for some reason, but it easily surpasses other apps on AppStore and has a simple and easy to use UI

title: Gotta wear gloves to use this one.
review: Something's up with the app. iPhone gets very hot. From the moment you login you can feel iPhone warming up. By the time you're chatting it's the equivalent of iPhone being left out in the sun. Better to save the site to your home screen and use that way, at least until a fix is published.

title: So excited to finally have an OFFICIAL app for iOS
review: The app is great so far, really love the search function. Was a little disappointment to not see plug-in support for the app yet, but hopefully that is coming!

title: Very nice, just some advices
review: Brilliant UX, just add replies formatting like it made in the web version. Also it would be intuitive to add swipe from the right to start the new conversation scenario.

title: Professor
review: Offers data and explanation but cautions about taking everything as fact need other sources too

title: Voice Conversations in new update
review: The new conversation mode is unbelievably realistic. It feels like you are chatting with a real person. This is truly a testament to technological progress.

title: New update? Not supported in country?
review: After updating to the most recent version, I can no longer user ChatGPT in Eswatini, Africa. Is this region specific? What happened? Was logged out of the app on my iPad and iPhone. Do we need to resort to using VPN now? Just a traveler promoting my way to a better future.

title: The most incredible tech revolution in my lifetime!

This is a great ai app! It can do RPs give you a scientific explanation for something heck, even explain something to you like your a 5 year old!

At this stage this is the shiniest most powerful tool you can use in your personal and professional life.

review:
Of course ChatGPT is amazing. The app itself is good. It’s simple, I wish it had more features and cleaner interface, but it’s good. 

I love that you can search history.

title: Grossly in accurate searches
review: Don’t use this to get accurate info. Only for more creative uses where you can judge quality of outcome yourself. Don’t rely on it for accurate figures. I search the same questions multiple times and get different figures every time. About to delete it. A sophisticated lie machine. Sadly, it keeps getting worse and won’t stop with patronizing responses.

title: Can verify my phone number app unusable
review: verifying my phone number the app loads forever, I tried updating and everything I could.

title: Must have
review: I use the app for everything. Revolutionary. Writing and communicating my ideas to other people has become a lot easier thanks to chatGPT.

title: Finally an app!
review: Ive had this website bookmarked and put on my home screen for 2 months now. Im very pleased with this new app and the design and animations are cool and well worth the wait.

title: Love it but…
review: Love this app so much but when entering a prompt sometimes when you want it to write a story and you don’t say a story it says inappropriate or something so I have to say story.

title: I Plug-in or web access?
review: I have access to Plug-in’s and web access but it doesn’t let me use it on the app? Is this just a feature that hasn’t been added yet or am I missing something?

title: Finally
review: This app came without notice and without any announcement from Open AI but I’m pleasantly surprised anyway. So far it’s a much more pleasant experience on the app compared to the desktop. I love it

title: No Native iPad or M1/2 Support in 2023?
review:
Cmon devs…I installed this app on my phone and iPad. Yet on the iPad it’s just the tiny phone version. Zero effort to accommodate larger screened apple devices…you know…those things that are better suited for handling large amounts of text?

Feature Request: Please offer a native iPad experience and set the toggle to allow the iPad version to run on M1/2 Macs. For such amazing tech the front end presentation is severely lacking.

title: You’re not getting my real phone number
review:
The amount of spam calls and texts I get is disgusting. I’m not letting you sell my phone number to your advertisers. Period.

The argument for “security” is bull. SMS spoofing is a real thing, and can literally let your bank account stolen. This is purely for advertising. Even when using Apple sign on!

You’re not getting my freaking phone number, goodness!

title: THIS IS THE OFFICIAL ONE!
review: Finally, the official OpenAI ChatGPT is here, don't fall for any of the others ones trying to charge you weekly, this is the OFFICIAL app! It's great and works well, and the AI is just as lovely as before. Can't wait to get my hands on the plugins!

title: Great app but need to have better sharing
review: Would be great to be able to share formatted responses like tables. Or even better share the chat conversation with a unique url.

title: Been waiting for this!
review: Fast and reliable! I love the haptic feedback feature added in. Super excited to see the coming updates to this app.

title: A very Helpful Tool
review: The ChatGPT has been my companion when it comes to navigating the path of new ideas and guidance. I don’t see how I managed life to this point without it. It’s a great tool.

Is amazing how in this modern and busy life we can account with this amazing  tool when we are in rush or in stress time with out creatively in moments. I really recommend  this for everyone.

title: Don’t wait, just do it

title: Broken

Guess I’ll ask for a Plus refund. No point in being charged if I can’t use it from mobile, as I rarely use desktop. Have had this issue for about a week now.

all good this eventually get used for ill intentions…
